Name: carla w.
Title: Missing
Review: I only received 6 pair not 12 the photo shows 12 pairs I‚Äôd like a replacement please

Name: mamma3
Title: Hane's Red Label Crew socks
Review: I really don't like to write bad reviews but these socks are really not good.  They are white and cushion-y but they have very little shape.  They do not hug the feet.  They fall down and bunk inside boots.  My daughter won't even wear them.  (I bought the same sock for my son (Green Label Crew) in a different size and they are exactly as terrible as the "girls").  I am not usually disappointed in any Hanes products but these are definitely not acceptable.

Name: DinaZ
Title: No shape to these socks
Review: They were actually very funny as the shape was balloon-like at the bottom of the tube ankle part.There was no way these socks would fit, keep a sock shape or fit inside a shoe.We threw them out. Not even good enough for sock monkeys.

Name: bronx girl
Title: tears quickly
Review: These sock tore at the top area quickly. I would not recommend them.

Name: Summer
Title: Terrible
Review: These feel like polyester and washed terribly. Pills and pulls all over, following the first wear/wash. Sent them back for a refund.

Name: 47states
Title: Not as pictured - half had colored toes
Review: The socks were okay but I bought these for a boy and the socks that arrived were half white and the other half had colored toes. My brother is handicapped and only likes white Hanes without the grey heel so I thought these would be perfect but they mis-represented them (or sent the wrong ones).

Name: Cassie Richardson
Title: Nice socks but triple check your sizing
Review: *Above pictures show a women‚Äôs size medium sock for comparison.Second picture shows a boys size large on the left (same brand) and a girls size medium on the right (two different brands)*My 7 year old daughter wears a girls medium in any other sock. She‚Äôs growing out of them so we bought a girls size large. I guess I‚Äôm to blame for not checking the sizing, but a girls large ranges from size 4-10??? I only wear a size 7. They should be labeled as one size fits all ages 13+ with that size range, or at least as women‚Äôs sized, not child sized. Not at all what I was trying to order.They seem like comfortable enough socks, I didn‚Äôt need more socks but I guess I have more socks now and still have to order more for my daughter. They also took forever to be delivered. Not very happy about my order.

Name: Kerry G.
Title: Way too large!
Review: Maybe I wasn‚Äôt understanding the sizing but I bought these for my 5 year old and they are huge!! She wears a children‚Äôs size 10 shoe. I returned them.  This was disappointing because the quality and value for the price seemed excellent. The size was the only reason why I gave this 3 stars overall. Otherwise I would‚Äôve rated them higher. I can‚Äôt comment on how they hold up in the wash.

Name: Anne
Title: Pilled up after one wash.
Review: Nice socks, until the first wash. Daughter liked them, but after one wash they are all pilled up, nasty looking! Not sure what the deal is, but all the Hane's socks I got her did this (purchased a few different styles from different retailers). They were to replace all of her FOTL socks, which had all pilled up (over time).

Name: Kendra H.
Title: They are not bad but they are wide not that stretchy or tight
Review: They are not bad but they are wide not that stretchy or tight. I would consider them around the house socks but my daughter could care less. I know they gather in her shoes...but it doesn't bother her.

Name: alexisf514
Title: Too large
Review: Socks are of good quality but they do not fit snugly around the foot, The length is not the problem, but they are very wide, at least for my granddaughters who are on the thin side.

Name: Kim Wright
Title: Great for kids
Review: Bought for my granddaughter and no complaints so far!

Name: Joshi's
Title: Fits
Review: These are good for the price. I wasn't expecting much because lets agree, none of the socks hold up for school kids.  These have so far.  they are super soft and has not shrinked.  The colors are vibrant and has literally every color to match all outfits.

Name: E. Greene
Title: Cute and comfy
Review: Perfect for the kid...she loves them...she wears a size 3 at 7 y/o..

Name: Vincent Morris
Title: Kid wears size 2 shoes needs medium socks
Review: The size chart is worthless... My 5 year old needs mediums instead of these large we ordered

Name: TMB
Title: sock sizing is confusing!
Review: I have always been baffled by the way socks are sized. I bought these for my daughter who is 9 and wears a size 4 shoe.  These are to fit size 4-10. While I was fully aware that these would be big in order to fit up to size 10, they were far bigger than I imagined.  They fit me and I wear a 9.  But they are soft and fit well and don't slouch around the ankles. I've washed them a few times and they are holding up well, which I expect from Hanes. I would recommend for durability and comfort but would caution on the fit and suggest these for anyone wearing a size 6-10. Anything smaller than that should go with the medium.

Name: Roser
Title: Good socks
Review: These are good socks.  Not as thick as I thought they'd be but they do the job.  They are not thin..

Name: Ashlie
Title: Plain socks
Review: Plain, white socks that are perfectly fine for my 4 year old girl. They aren't too thick so she can wear them with any shoe style, which I like.

Name: Romantic
Title: comfy
Review: Love 'em. Great price, great fit. Very comfortable to wear. I bought these and other socks for me and my girls, and all of us prefer wearing these by far.

Name: stephanie wells
Title: Got toes?
Review: Toes a bit boxy, but good sock for price.

Name: Stephanie Lerro
Title: The socks, have a good fit, look nice, and what‚Äôs good as they came with multiple pairs of them.
Review: The socks seem pretty good or true to size. What we like about it the most is that there‚Äôs multiple pairs of them and the color seem pretty good. Plus they fit pretty well for my daughter.

Name: Esther M√©ndez
Title: Muy a gusto con el producto, muchas gracias
Review: Son bastante c√≥modas, el material se v√© bastante bueno y resistente, los colores muy bonitos y bien combinados.

Name: Bre B
Title: Great quality
Review: These are great socks for my 4 year old. We've tried different brands that are not as great quality, don't last long, or feel too thin. These are thick, but not too thick. Comfy and easy for her to put on and off herself.

Name: Marian
Title: Perfect
Review: Comfy socks that fit well

Name: Julia
Title: Good, comfortable, fit.
Review: I have small feet. Those shocks fit me great.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Comfortable and durable!
Review: Comfortable. Nice and thick.  Durable!  And for a good price!  What more could you ask for?

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Fits my daughter perfectly!
Review: Excellent socks & you can‚Äôt beat the price.

Name: Brittany Bullock
Title: So soft!
Review: My daughter is very picky about socks and she LOVES these! They are sooo soft!!

Name: Kat
Title: Fits well
Review: Great fit for 9 year old who wears size 3, fits past the ankle bone and prevents the shoe from rubbing the back of her ankle

Name: Laura Sprague
Title: Great deal
Review: Good quality and good number of socks for the price

Name: Mathew
Title: Nice socks
Review: Perfect for my 6 year old girl. They have the right amount of fun with all the colors, while still allowing her to feel like she has socks "for big girls". They are so comfy and fit her perfectly; no problems with holes or threading. Would definitely buy again.

Name: shinobi
Title: Sizes are off
Review: Size XL is a 10. Most XLs in children‚Äôs clothes are 12/14. There isn‚Äôt a reliable size chart available and it makes purchasing very difficult.

Name: Robert Hallow Knight
Title: Poor Quality !
Review: I purchased these snow pants for my 7 year old granddaughter and the crotch seam split on the third use.  It doesn‚Äôt appear to have been completely sewn together just tacked together. If you zoom in on the photo you can see only the threads where the seam was tacked together every couple of inches.  So I would rate them poor in terms of durability and quality.

Name: Goldencurls90
Title: 115lbs 5‚Äô3
Review: Ummmmm these are not true to size AT ALL I prefer pink in M I am def a xs s but I wanted room. Um no I had to give these to a CHILD I weigh 115 and am 5‚Äô3 so like yeah

Name: Darcy
Title: They rip
Review: I bought my daughter the rainbow pair last year, I washed them and the whole crotch part ripped open. I thought well, they are a year old, no big deal.  A few weeks ago I bought the red pair, lesson learned!  She came home from school yesterday and this red pair ripped in the same spot!

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Zipper broke during first wear
Review: Zipper broke after the first wear. Quality is okay - but without a zipper they aren‚Äôt helpful! Now too late to return so we will end up spending more than the pants cost to replace the zipper. I may just invest in a better branded pair!

Name: Shannon Hoffman
Title: My Daughter was soaked!!!
Review: If I could give these 0 stars I would. My daughter wore these 1 time for about 15 minutes and came in completely soaked. They are not water/ snow resistant or waterproof at all! Maybe we just got a bad pair but I was very disappointed.

Name: Rakhee Sonthalia
Title: Didn‚Äôt even last 2 hours
Review: Stitch cake off on one leg after an hour of wearing. We then had to head to a store and buy a replacement. I would not buy this again.

Name: Teddy Barbeau
Title: poor fit
Review: The fit is not great. the outer leg fabric was constantly rolling up from the inner lining. Would not recommend or buy again.

Name: amydejonge
Title: Not durable
Review: They fit great & are want, but had holes in them within a couple of wears.

Name: Jose Arias
Title: Mal sistema no mantienen el precio al tratar de cambiar
Review: Trate de comprar esta ropa por el sistema prueba y paga despu√©s la talla que lleg√≥ era muy peque√±a trate de cambiarlo pero no me dio opci√≥n bueno inici√© la devoluci√≥n, para mi sorpresa inngreso nuevamente a comprar y me indica que si hay la talla que necesito pero el precio es mucho mayor me parece raro est√° situaci√≥n

Name: TheColorofTea
Title: Too puffy
Review: Uncomfortable, too puffy, hard to move in

Name: Delia M. Bryson
Title: Runs small
Review: It runs small..  ordered a large barely fits my 11 year old

Name: JA
Title: Cheap Zipper
Review: My daughter wore this about 3 times in Colorado.  The zipper seems to be plastic and one of the teeth were messed up so the zipper wouldn't stay closed it kept splitting open.

Name: Kianna Jensen
Title: Ripped within 6 weeks
Review: Knee ripped within the first 6 weeks of use. Otherwise they were awesome. Just bummed that they didnt last longer

Review: My daughter loved these snow pants from the moment she got them. For $37.00 snow pants this is unacceptable.Amazon- Please provide a contact email address so we can speak further about a replacement pair.

Name: Sara
Review: Bought these for my daughter but they were too small. Very well made but runs too small

Name: Amazon Customer
Review: Order big

Name: J B
Title: Torn cuff
Review: Snow pants cost about $20 with discount, but is it really a good deal when product arrives defective? Besides torn cuff, pants seemed nice. Who knows what will tear next though. Returned.

Name: tessa
Title: Fit wide
Review: I purchased these for back up for my children. Good for the money however the fit is wide. Fit more like a hefty size than standard.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Fits well, comfortable but not water resistant
Review: My daughter liked the feel of it but it did not keep her warm or dry. The suit got wet very quickly making her very cold very fast. Made it hard to enjoying playing in the first snow of the year. Will not buy again.

Name: stacy
Title: Not made for thick girls
Review: Was tight for the size

Name: lakegirl
Title: Covered in cat hair
Review: The bibs were just as I expected, except they were covered in cat hair!!!! Considered returning them, but since they are only going to be used to play in, I will just wash them. I‚Äôm guessing they were returned at some point. They should definitely check theirs returns, because is someone was allergic, it could cause a serious problem!!

Name: Erica
Title: Good snow pants, almost great
Review: Great snow pants but already have to repair them. We use them a lot but after about 4 uses I noticed a seam that already needs repair. They do the job well but wished I didn't have to mend them already.

Name: KIMBERLEE
Title: Too small!
Review: 3 stars because the fit is not accurate but the overall quality and fabric is great for the price. I ordered these for my 10 year old and they fit my 6 year old.

Title: Looks like use
Review: Product arrived with no tag and dirty looks like if it was use.  I returned

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Didn't last long
Review: Sadly these lasted 2 1/2 months before they started ripping apart in the crotch:(

Name: Daniel J MacArthur
Title: Very Long
Review: I order the medium which is a 7/8. These are very long. Even with the straps set to the smallest setting. We will keep and just hem up the bottom. Should get several seasons out of them

Name: DeadpanAnn
Title: Perfect for playing in the snow
Review: We don't do winter sports, but I wanted my kids to be able to play in the snow for longer than 10 minutes. These seem excellent quality for the price and should do the job. They wouldn't be great for winter sports, but when you have a warm house to step right into and comfies to slip inti they'll work. Good enough to skip forking out the BIG $$$ for gear they'll wear 3x, then outgrow.

Name: John
Title: Quality made for memories
Review: Recently moved to Western NY. Bought these for my 5 year old daughter she played outside for about 45 minutes before her nose got cold. She never mentioned anything was cold but her nose. Her pants under these were completely dry except a little around her boots. My fault not the snow pants fault

Name: Brandilyn Fry
Title: Runs a little small
Review: Bought an XXL for my child that wears a 14/16 and it fit, but won't last us past this snow season.  I would recommend a size up.

Name: Erin
Title: runs large, great for price
Review: I had meant to order my son a 3T, but accidentally ordered 2T. It worked out perfectly as the bib runs large. We live in Florida and needed a bib for a trip to NY. Definitely worth $20.

Name: Shaun M. Davis
Title: Better quality and features than expected.
Review: We have not had a chance to test these in action in the snow but from what I‚Äôve seen so far these are among the better pair of snow-bibs I‚Äôve seen, having shopped around a lot in stores. The seat and knees reinforcement are decent but, again, not sure yet how they will hold up in actual use. Zipper pockets are nice, adjustable shoulder and waste straps are nice. There‚Äôs a ring which I presume to be for hooking gloves on, which I like as a much hetter option to store gloves when not in use. We ordered purple and pink and the colors are great - the girls both love them in terms of appearance and feel/fit, not that appearance is important especially with snow-bibs. All-in-all I was pleasantly surprised with these, as Amazon name branded attire is new to us and the price point created doubt in what I would get. Not 5 stars because we haven't tested true quality in withstanding kids playing in snow.

Name: Kelly H.
Title: True to sizing
Review: My daughter has only gotten to wear them once so far since we received them and they fit as expected and kept her warm and dry.  I would say only issue was the length of time it took to get them.

Name: Shopper8
Title: Good buy
Review: These are surprisingly good quality at an affordable price. Room to grow for my 6 YO and a cute pattern.

Name: Viktor Vaughn
Title: Big zipper in the middle makes it easier to get ON/OFF
Review: big zipper in the middle makes it easier to get on and off.  Comfortable material inside and water-resistant outside.  Played in the snow and went sledding...would buy again, but they do run a bit big...not enough to order a smaller size, they will grow into it.  I expect these to last a few years of snow play.

Name: Jessica Buxton
Title: Fits true to siZe
Review: This arrived the wrong color. I ordered the navy with light pink fabric on the inside but recieved the neon yellow.

Name: Chris
Title: Warm and dry toddler
Review: Can‚Äôt beat these for the prices. They keep my toddler warm out in the snow and dry.

Name: Bob
Title: Good Quality.
Review: I am so happy with the quality of the fabric. It was extremely soft on the inside and the fit was just right for my daughter. The pattern was identical to the photo as well. Very happy with the purchase.

Name: Elia
Title: Really nice snow bibs
Review: Fit is perfect, quality is really good.

Name: Dbee
Title: Very worthy for montana winter
Review: Water resistant. Great strong quality material. 6yr old approved. We went up a size as per reviews. They are BIG. Keeping tho, they keep the kid warm in 15 and below Temps in a breezy town in Montana.

Name: Kbetker
Title: Perfect for the price
Review: Very happy I got this on deal, perfect for my growing girl to be prepared for snow.

Name: Elizabeth
Title: Great Quality for the Price
Review: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these snowpants.  I got them for my almost 6 year old.  She's starting to grow out of size 5 and wears smaller size 6's so I got a SMALL (which the size chart says is equivalent to size 6-7).  They are a bit big, as I expected they would be, but they should fit great next year.  She's already worn them outside in the snow this year and we just roll the bottoms up once and adjusted the straps as small as we can and they were fine. They are quite wide in the legs, but they're still fine even on my stringbean of a kid.  They are very thick and warm and will be great for our super snowy and cold winters here in Tahoe.UPDATE 1/2021 - These are some of the best snow pants I've found. We've had them for almost 2 years now. We live in Tahoe where we have snow on the ground 5-6 months of the year and she has worn these pants A LOT. They have held up, have no tears or rips, and will still probably fit her for another year. These are definitely the best deal I've found on pants that last and hold up for a long time. We've bought more expensive pants in the past that have not held up as long as these $30ish ones have. Definitely recommend and would give 10 stars if I could.

Name: Professorowl
Title: These are great snow pants!
Review: These are great snow pants! Since we live in an area where it's snowy and cold in the winter, my daughter is used to wearing snow pants every late fall/winter/spring. We've bought different brands over the years. Last year, she had Columbia snow pants, but she outgrew them. Since these pants were less expensive, I thought she could give them a go. I'm so glad I bought them. This late fall/early winter weather has been colder and snowier than usual. She has worn them multiple times, including at our town's outdoor ice skating rink. My daughter said they keep her warm, dry, and she can move well in them. They also was well, dry quickly, and the fabric seems quite durable. The elastic cuffs at the ankles work very well to keep the snow out instead of soaking the bottom part her leggings on the inside (like most of her other snow pants did). These snow pants work much better than any of the other snow pants she has owned over the years, including the Columbia brand. They fit just a bit bigger than usual, so I'm hoping she might be able to get two seasons out of them instead of just one. I highly recommend these pants, especially for active, snow-loving kiddos.

Name: Sara Pote
Title: Good quality
Review: I bought this for my daughter who is a tall and slender 4.5 year old. I wanted it big so we can use it for two years and this is perfect! The Velcro tabs on the sides allowed me to fit it to her size so there are no gaps which was perfect (and were  not on the other brand I ordered). Seems like it will be durable. My daughter was quite warm when she wore it. Overall, I‚Äôm satisfied and would buy it again.

Name: Tina G
Title: Amazing Snow-pant/bibs! Warm, dry, durable!
Review: She said they keep her warm and her legs are never cold! Also, snow doesn‚Äôt go up her coat onto her stomach because they are bibs. She loves the two pockets and the loops for mittens and she said that the straps over her shoulders don‚Äôt bother her at all. I really like the extra fabric on the knees and on  the backside; the regular fabric on these durable  but when you add two layers, it works especially well and I think the extra layers on the knees and the backside really help to keep her dry because that‚Äôs mainly what she‚Äôs doing... sitting or kneeling.We priced a lot of snow bibs, especially looking at Lands‚Äô End and L.L. Bean. We ended up with these  because I‚Äôd the price point but, in the end, I think they were the best choice!!

Name: Mike S
Title: Warm, quality, inexpensive!
Review: So we bought these out of desperation, once we learned the snowsuit we had for my daughter was too large for an upcoming trip to see family in Northern Minnesota.  It turns out this was a a GREAT purchase!  My daughter just turned 4 and we bought the 4T size in pink.  They are a bit big even when adjusted to be as tight as possible.  That said, I don't regret the purchase as I really think these will fit next season.  At $15 per year, I think these are a phenomenal deal.  We are from Southern California, used to a low of 45 in the depths of winter.  My daughter spent several hours climbing through snow berms in 18 degree weather with utterly no complaints of being cold.  I was really skeptical that the Amazon Basics brand, as I had no prior experience.  However, the quality of the materials and stitching seems on par with any major brand, and the warmth is plenty adequate.  Homerun!

Name: G. V.
Title: Warm and Dry
Review: I bought this for my two and a half year old - her preschool class goes outside to play everyday, and only stays inside if it's really, really cold.  It seems to keep her comfortable and happy when she's on the playground.  Her teachers take photos of the kids and put them on an app so parents can see what they do throughout the day, and kiddo always seems to be having a blast outside when I review the pics - so she certainly can't be very cold when she's running around during our New England winter.  Her clothes aren't wet when I pick her up at the end of the day, so it also seems to keep her dry in the snow.It runs large on her, but she's a tiny kid - so I'd say that it's true to size.The price was great too, so overall I'm happy with my purchase.  My daughter certainly seems happy with it, too!

Name: Kristi
Title: Cheap!!! Hole ripped in first 2 minutes!!!
Review: My daughter is 7. I got these for her to wear around the house as play clothes. As she was putting them on for the first time a giant hole ripped in the seam in the butt of the pants!!! Waste of money!!! I was going to order more in different colors but I will go elsewhere! You get what you pay for but she never even got to wear these!!! I will say that she has had other children's place leggings in the past and they lasted her awhile. Idk if they switched to cheaper materials or this was just a fluke or what but I'm so disappointed!!

Name: Angie
Title: Cheap material- holes began forming after only hours of wear
Review: My son is in ballet. He went to class and by the time we were home, multiple small holes had began to form in the leggings. He literally only danced in these.

Name: Chris
Title: Sizing WAY off, legs don't match
Review: One leg was 2-3 inches shorter than the other. We ordered xx large, and these were maybe medium-large. Couldn't wear

Name: Gilbert H.
Title: Too small. Skinny as straw.
Review: Wasted of time. way too small and way to skinny. Someone makes sleeves as legging.

Name: Michelle
Title: Poor quality control
Review: The tag is in the side that should be the front.

Name: Paige Giebel
Title: Crusty old basement leggings
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†One of the leggings is fine. The other smells like it‚Äôs been sitting in a soggy basement for years. They‚Äôre faded and stretched out.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: These are very thin and not soft.
Review: These are not soft. Very thin. And run small. Returned.

Name: Catherine D.
Title: Pants came with a whole in them along the seem.
Review: My daughter wore these pants and noticed a whole in them the first time she put them on.

Name: Anna M
Title: These leggings are too skinny and they bulge in the wrong places
Review: I bought a size 8 for my 8 year old and promptly returned them as they were so skinny she couldn't even get them on comfortably. I bought a size 10 which i have kept BUT the first time she put them on I thought they were back to front as there was a bulge at the front. Nope they are just made like that. it was a 2 pack so I saw that both pairs were the same. I kept them only because she needed them for school uniform and i had to return the smaller ones already and thought her skirt will be over them anyway so no big deal. The thing is, she wears black leggings on the weekend too and every time she puts these leggings on I see that hideous bulge and have to stop myself from asking if they are back to front. If she has another black pair in another brand I ask her to change. So, 1 star for the shape, 1 star for the fit.

Name: Mai Thao
Title: Size are wrong
Review: My 5 years old wear size xs in girl legging. These were like xxs didn't fit her. Waste of money and time Lol

Name: Ivana Cherie
Title: Denim color runs wayyyy small
Review: Quality is good. The denim runs extremely small. My daughter fits 3T leggings of every brand I‚Äôve bought. I bought her a 4 in these and she has to wiggle to get them on and when she bends over her rear is exposed. They fit like a carters size 2T.I got myself matching size girls 16 and I‚Äôm in the same boat as her. 16 in girls should be more than adequate for me. I‚Äôd go up two sizes in the denim since it has very little stretch. I can‚Äôt speak for the other colors.

Name: Em
Title: Warning: these run SMALL!
Review: Warning: these run SMALL! If you order size 5/6 for your 6 year old that normally wears a 5 - you will end up with CAPRIS. Order a size up if you actually want PANTS for your child. Now my daughter has 2 brand new CAPRIS....in NOVEMBER. üò†

Name: Tanya Havens
Title: Don‚Äôt last, to thin
Review: Purchased a month ago, not worn more than once per week and already have a hole in knee! So not for kids who sit in school on their knees!

Name: BellaK
Title: Uncomfortable and sizing seems wrong
Review: I had to return.  Did not come up to her waist and uncomfortable for her to wear.  I don't think a larger size would have taken care of this problem.  She is average height and thin.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Lasted one day
Review: Leggings are my little muffin‚Äôs kindergarten go-to. She‚Äôs active at school, and these just didn‚Äôt cut it. They‚Äôre soft, comfy enough if she were just loafing around on the weekend (hence the 2 stars) but I wouldn‚Äôt recommend for kiddos who will be out climbing and playing. On the first day of wearing them I had to discreetly wrap a coat around her waist. Poor kid was blissfully unaware of a million little holes/tears.

Name: Bree
Title: Holes in the knees in less than a month.
Review: Hey children‚Äôs place: girls are active too. These came home from school with holes in the knees within a month.Please make them with thicker fabric.

Name: Gena Dale
Title: Thin and runs VERY small.
Review: This company is usually pretty accurate for sizing when I buy in-store. These pants were thin as a nightgown and at least 2 sizes too small. I will be returning.

Name: Tiffany
Title: Stitching is horrible
Review: Legging came with huge section not sewn...

Name: J.L
Title: Too small
Review: Way too small and tight

Name: Chrissy Marie
Title: These leggings will get a hole in the knee after a handful of washings‚Ä¶
Review: I have bought three different sets of these black leggings and additionally white and pink. I keep buying them because I absolutely love the way they fit my daughter. Unfortunately, after about five washings the leggings get a small hole in the same exact area of all pants. Quality control needs to take notice, there‚Äôs definitely a manufacturing flaw. If you‚Äôre looking for a great fitting disposable legging, these are it. Unfortunately they are not going to last too long. I keep buying because of the price point and fit knowing they‚Äôre short-term but I just wanted to make buyers beware‚Ä¶

Name: Paige
Title: The size chart is wrong
Review: The size chart provided is wrong.It said an XXL was for 11-12y.So I figured that was the around a size 12 girls.Nope! Was a 16 that‚Äôs why I put 3 stars.

Name: Tana Moore
Title: Should‚Äôve ordered a size up
Review: They run small

Name: Danny Chen
Title: The pant legs are not the same length
Review: Prior to wearing, I washed and dried the leggings and while folding laundry I noticed that the right leg is almost 2 inches longer than the other.  This may not be a problem for children who have a longer right leg; however, my child's legs are the same length.  Otherwise, the leggings are typical thin, soft, cotton, and stretchy.  Looks like I will be hemming them into capris to match my child's symmetrical legs!

Name: Brittney
Title: Runs way small
Review: My kid is 3 foot and 42 pounds. Ordered her normal size and it was nowhere near big enough

Name: Heidi Thompson
Title: 2 inch hole in left leg seam. Otherwise good fit
Review: Overall ok. When my daughter tried it on we discovered a 2 inch long hole in the seam of the left leg. Easy to fix w/ simple needle and thread but still disappointing to find.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Size up

Title: Durable and Soft

Name: Melanie
Title: Don't expect the print you ordered...
Review: Already had the set with zebras and butterflies, tried ordering the set with clouds and teddy bears and I suppose they thought we just needed more zebras and butterflies. Really stinks because my daughter is potty training and is really excited about different prints but she got excited just to open it and see the same underwear she already has. From a mother who's trying everything to keep her toddler engaged and excited about potty training, thanks a lot. I'd return but the point was to get more underwear for accidents, we expected to have these in time to for her to start her week at daycare so returning would be insult to injury.

Name: Mackenzie Steele
Title: Not the best!
Review: I bought these along with a package of Hanes panties while potty training my daughter & these were not it for us. She is a true 2T, so I bought that size in both panties. The Hanes are so soft, the cut is great on her, & the sizing is 100% true to size. With these, they are so big in her waist & SUPER tight on her legs! I will add that she is a small toddler, so about 28 pounds with long, skinny legs! The cut is so high that you can see them over her shorts which I was not okay with. I would not recommend these at all!

Name: An
Title: Terribly uncomfortable
Review: I thought I got a great deal for the price but UGH these are soooo tight around my skinny toddlers waist while being baggy everywhere else. I sized up one size. They‚Äôre also.. high waisted‚Ä¶ very strange fit for a toddler.

Name: L
Title: Manufacturing whoops!
Review: Same product ordered. Same product delivered, and supposedly same product given but they are clearly two different sizes! They say 4T and 5T but one package is all much smaller than the others. They even say they are 4T/5T in the underwear themselves and not just on the plastic package. Major malfunctioning by the manufacturer.

Name: Sarah Cookley
Title: Pattern choosers beware
Review: My daughter chose the pattern she wanted based on the pictures. What I received is not even close to what she picked. I really hate when it is Amazon‚Äôs mistake and then I go to return it and I‚Äôm the one that will have to be inconvenienced to go somewhere to drop the item off. Getting my kid to pick out an outfit is so hard already, I was hoping if she had a choice in the underwear, she would be excited. Stinks to not get what you bought, then have to wait longer to get the right item, AND head to the store to return.

Name: Jessie Gordon
Title: Not Designs/Colors in the Picture
Review: My two-year-old daughter won‚Äôt care, but when you purchase these, they apparently may or may not be the colors or designs that are in the photo here. We got bright blue, hot pink, and others with swans, stars, etc. Not worth the hassle of returning, but certainly won‚Äôt purchase again.

Name: samantha
Title: Falling apart
Review: Good for potty training but it is hemmed weird and coming apart

Name: Page Castro
Title: Review

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Not what I ordered.
Review: I ordered this product based off the assortment I saw in the picture provided. I don't recall reading in description that you would receive whatever they felt like sending you and would be nothing like the "false" picture provided. I ordered this specifically for the unicorns as my daughter has refused to wear underwear for years and the other day decided to wear underwear. We picked these out together, that she wanted to wear, and anxiously awaited the arrival of her new unicorn underwear. Instead we received what look like llamas.  Extremely disappointed in the false advertising and am sure that many purchases are made with the customer assuming they will receive the item of assorted underwear pictured!

I ended up getting a set from a dollar general and they were perfect. Sizing is all wrong with these and omg don‚Äôt get me starting on washing them. Like I said, they fit my 3 month old!

I bought the pack with 4 styles for her, 3 being designed and the others were plain colors. She was really excited for her new flower panties and we received two packs of panties with two designs: assorted plain colors , and one pattern : zebras with flowers.My daughter is fussy and doesn't like these, but I have a niece who can use them. Disappointed as we were sort of counting on these panties to get here today and now I have to buy others.

Name: Anna Kay
Title: Too small for average sized two year old

Name: Jessica
Title: Not As Pictured
Review: I received the same underwear that others have posted pictures of. A completely different set than what is pictured. Normally I wouldn't leave a bad review for a product based on a packing mistake, but the replacement item that was sent to me (after I left a description in the return request, saying that I was returning the product because it was the wrong pattern) was the exact same (not as pictured) set of underwear that I received the first time. It is nowhere near as cute as the underwear in the picture, and I won't be keeping either package. I've seen other comments from people saying that maybe they should have known they might receive a different product, since the listing says "assorted." But "assorted" refers to the fact that there are multiple different patterns in the set, not that you might get a completely different set of underwear entirely! It's a shame that this listing is allowed to stay up and continue to mislead buyers with the wrong product image.

Name: Shannon B.
Title: Shrink so much after washing they don't fit
Review: Washed half and they shrunk much smaller than the ones unwashed so they don't fit size they say, leg wholes not big enough for my very thin child. Definitely don't fit like most underwear. Unfortunately I bought them early so didn't try them on her right away so too late to return

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Do not like the eco packaging
Review: Not enamored at all with the "eco packaging." It is reminiscent of my years working retail when the returns were repackaged for resale. I inspected every pair and will of course wash them before use but this will be my last online purchase from Fruit of the Loom.

Name: Joni E. Barker
Title: Way too small- compared to same style and size in Hanes
Review: So I bought these for my daughter and thought they would be on the big side. But she tried them on and they were too small. So I go to the store and buy the same size and style in Hanes underwear and held them together and they are completely cut differently. The Hanes from the store were cut larger fit her perfect but these were too tight (both were briefs and size 16).

Name: Beth Durham
Title: Size 10 is SAME size as Hanes size 8
Review: Bought to replace Hanes Size 8 undies - these are the same size so they are no good since my daughter already outgrew the size 8's. So, wasted money!

Name: Kayla Hammers
Title: Stains and weird sizing
Review: I ordered 2 packs of the same brand (fruit&loom) underwear in a size 4 the striped pair came in this pack and the blue pair came from another pack I ordered at the same time. The striped pair has a brown stain near the butt (which I hope it‚Äôs not what I think it is‚Ä¶ yuck‚Ä¶). The entire pack is slightly larger then the other SAME BRAND, SAME SIZE pack of underwear I purchased at the same time. For reference I added a picture of one from each pack on top of the other so you can see the striped pair are bigger then the blue pair. Highly disappointed and I really hope these aren‚Äôt used underwearü§¢

Name: Bridget Kaspor
Title: DESIGNS NOT AS PICTURED
Review: Like others, we did not receive the prints in the photo. Even returned and ordered again hoping maybe it was a mistake. Very disappointed

Name: Melissa
Title: Sizing is way off!
Review: My little girl wears a 5T in regular clothing and bought a size 8 underwear (according to sizing chart this would have been very roomy for her) and  instead it is way too small doesn‚Äôt even pull up all the way. Material is also super thin.

Name: Ty Madison
Title: BUYERS BEWARE! Not as shown!
Review: Not the pattern shown. Assumed the ‚Äúassorted‚Äù pack was the same assorted undies shown in the photos. Not happy AT ALL. I have a girlie girl she will never wear these. We would never have picked this pattern. Please show options of patterns to pick instead of taking it upon yourself to pick for me.Sincerely, An aggravated mom of 3 who doesn‚Äôt have time for nonsense returns.

Name: Mynoah030409
Title: The underwear sent look nothing like the ones advertised
Review: The advertised underwear were so cute with pretty designs, which is why I purchased them.  However, the ones I received are ugly.  I wouldn't have ordered these if I knew they were going to send me whatever design they wanted! I specifically ordered them for the advertised designs.  Just go to Walmart and pick them out yourself.

Name: Jillian
Title: Disappointed that I was deceived
Review: Purposely picked this underwear because of the cute style. Did not receive what is pictured. Received a completely different style. Sure the quality is fine and my daughter will still wear them, but it‚Äôs just wrong to deceive customers! I worked hard for my money and I did not receive the product I wanted! Not cool!

Name: Matthew
Title: Not as pictured
Review: The description of this product was misleading. The listing shows floral print, but the product that we received was entirely different. It does say "assorted", but the package itself includes assorted prints, so I assumed that's what it meant. If you wil receive one of a variety of options, they should make that more clear or at least show photos for the other options you may be receiving instead.As far as the product itself, the value is good and the fit is accurate. But I wouldn't buy this product if you are specifically wanting the option shown.

Name: Kiecha Caesar
Title: Love the option of different colors
Review: Should not be washed in machine‚Ä¶. One was and the waist dismantle

Name: Kristal
Title: Not a good purchase for us
Review: My toddler just turned 4 weighs 40lbs and is tall. I purchased size 6. These were not it. To tight and have no stretch.

Name: Jessica
Title: Not even close to the designs pictured
Review: My daughter wanted the pretty floral designs pictured. We were sent really ugly designs.

Name: Lora Barger
Title: Tiny
Review: We ordered up to a size 10. I held this up to my daughters size 8 Hanes that we have shrunk and washed a million times, and these were smaller right out of the package. If I washed and dried these, they would most definitely be a size 6. She couldn‚Äôt even get them up her thighs, the leg openings were so small. Returning these for Hanes.

Name: Vicky Obando Aguirre
Title: Mala calidad
Review: No son de buena calidad, me imagino que por el precio est√° bien, pero si quieren algo que dure pues este producto no es el indicado, se estiran con las primeras lavadas, transparenta la tela, se opaca el color

Name: Tony Shoemaker
Title: Mixed sizes even though ordered size 8
Review: I ordered size 8. But somehow received one underwear that was size 4.  Not sure how that passed inspection but at least I received 13 out of the 14 that were the right size. I guess now my daughter will have one for her doll?

Name: Maria Kahn
Title: changes color, leaves marks on skin
Review: leaves color marks on the skin

Name: Emily
Title: Did not receive 14 pairs i received 12 pairs
Review:
The media could not be loaded.
                



¬†I like that they are good and as stateted fruit of the loom but seriously disappointed that i didnt recieve 14 pairs

Name: Angela
Title: They are a great value
Review: They run a little small but they will do

Name: mpequini
Title: Wrong patterns
Review: The product is as expected. Slight chemical smell upon opening, which goes away after washing. Shrinks after first wash. My biggest issue is, as others said, I received the wrong pattern. I ordered a pack with mostly pink in it, which is my daughter‚Äôs favorite color, but received a pack with mostly blue. Meh, it‚Äôs underwear, it is what it is. But still disappointing since it‚Äôs not what I paid for.

Name: Beeks
Title: Only received 19!
Review: The description stated it was a package of 20. I only received 19. Not cool Fruit of the Loom!

Name: Alexa
Title: Not very happy with them
Review: They fit good on my kid except for all the openings around the waist and thighs. Those places are tight even though I sized up just in case when I bought these. My kid is average size not too big not too small, and yet we faced this problem

Name: Jennifer J
Title: Mystery Pack Not Multipack - Incorrect Advertising but Good Underwear
Review: We specifically chose these for the design (which was very girly and more pastel). My girls all chose theirs for "back to school." These are advertised as a "multipack" but they should be marketed as a "mystery pack" (which typically isn't allowed unless options are shown). My daughter didn't love these, but my youngest daughter said they were "okay" and she'd keep them for when they fit her.We didn't try the fit yet, but we typically do like this brand.

Name: She Writes
Title: Runs smaller than expected
Review: They're not very consistent in cut - some have a higher rise, others are really narrow. I recommend ordering a size up, otherwise they're fine.

Name: pj
Title: For thinner legs
Review: These are soft and feel nice. My daughters legs are not skinny. She is just more solid and the legs are tight on her. Too bad I just bought and washed them.

Name: Angelica19273
Title: Up size
Review: Once washed they do shrink so I would recommend up sizing! My daughters little cheeks hang out them now.

Name: Nicole D. R.
Title: The sizing is off
Review: These underwear did not seem to be consistently sized. Some of them fit my daughter well and others were way too small. It's very frustrating to receive a pack of size 10 underwear and then discover half of them are not a size 10.

Name: FamilyShopper
Title: Run small!!  Otherwise great!
Review: My girl is in 4t clothes and currently had 4t/5t underwear from Walmart.  I'm all about buying a size up to avoid buying underwear and socks in every size and the other reviews were so helpful!  I'm so glad I bought a 6, they fit her very well, even better than these Wonder Nation from Walmart.  They do shrink some.  The yellow is the wonder nation 4t/5t washed and dried with these new out of package underneath.  These did shrink some, but just the right amount.  I'm thankful for the price and the reviews that helped me choose the right size she can grow into. üëçüèª We just got them so no reviews on how they holdup yet.Edit to add: these in a size 6 is definitely for a 4t-5t hip!

Name: Mabohka
Title: pretty good
Review: The fabric is very thin, but they fit well and have given my granddaughter more options for now.

Name: Stephanie L Godwin
Title: Great price for the quantity
Review: Ordered them a little too big for right now but was good to get for the price.

Name: rideswithchrist
Title: Good underwear. But...
Review: These underwear are really nice and comfy; very soft and stretchy, give full coverage, don't ride up, and they fit as expected.But, the reason I gave them only four stars is because of how unmistakably see-through they are.When I took them out of the package, I could see the back-side of the underwear through the front fabric...Other than that, good underwear for a great price!

Name: Karen Brown
Title: Fit perfectly
Review: My daughter is 10 and choose size 10 and they fit perfectly. The colors were not what i expected, but it can work.

Name: Connie J.
Title: Love
Review: Perfect for my needs but too expensive for what ya get

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Runs small. Quality good
Review: My daughter wears a 4T so I bought 4, they fit well but are alittle Snug around the waistband. She won't be able to wear them long but they fit for now. They are good quality, sit alittle higher on the waist. Colors are good too

Name: tina f.
Title: Great for my OCC boxes.
Review: I buy these for my Operation Christmas Child (OCC) boxes. Sadly this pack is missing a pair of panties. I have ten other packs to open and hopefully this will be the only pack like this because every pair is needed.

Name: Santiago Zhago
Title: Bueno
Review: Quedan Justos..  recomiendo una talla m√°s. Buen material.

Name: Lacey
Title: Bought these for my toddler
Review: Easy to pull and down.Some were smaller than the other but they still fit her so I‚Äôm happy.

Name: Sassha Altagracia
Title: Great quality!
Review: My daughter loves these panties! They‚Äôre soft, stretchy and comfortable so easy to pull up and down. Great buy!

Name: Same Old Same Old
Title: Briefs
Review: Got to keep at my house for my grand daughters. Sometimes they forget to bring clean underwear or don‚Äôt know they are spending night when they come to grandma‚Äôs.

Name: Denis Z.
Title: Buena ropa
Review: Los compre para mi hija y le quedaron perfectos buen precio para ser una buena cantidad de blummers

Name: Brittany Toran
Title: Cotton
Review: Very comfortable for my 8 yr old they wash and fit the same no shrinkage at all

Title: Soft material Stretch

Name: Karen Espinoza
Title: Worth it

Name: Rachel
Title: Cute and comfy

Title: Bueno, Bonito y Barato
Review: lo recomiendo

Name: Linda Tompkins
Title: Good brand

Name: MontessoriMama
Title: Zipper busted not even a year later

Name: Sheerbliss
Title: Thin, NOT PUFFY
Review: This jacket is really thin and looks more quilted than anything. Not puffy by any means. If you want puffy go elsewhere.

Name: Momo5
Title: Disappointed
Review: This jacket is beautiful but way too small and VERY thin. I bought an XL for my 8 year old thinking that she would grow into it. She is a normal size for her age and I instantly regretted it when I saw it. She'll be able to wear it this winter but that's it. Size way up to get your money's  worth.

Name: S. Chavez
Title: Bought NEW and these ppl sent a USED
Review: I bough this for my daughter for xmas and thankfully I opened it up before then and noticed this had a kids name on the jacket it wouldn't be a big deal if I would have purchased this used AND NOT DURING COVID-19 but this item and the product description is not correct do not buy this item these ppl are just trying to make a quick buck. very very disappointed specially because it is during covid-19 and do not want to buy anything used I am very mad to know that these ppl do not care about my child's health or my own by sending something used when I paid for NEW

Name: S. Webb
Title: XXL = 11-12?? Very Disappointed!!!
Review: My daughter is usually an XL (14-16), but I wanted to get a size up as she‚Äôs always growing. I searched high and low for a pastel rainbow or ombr√© jacket and thought this would be perfect until I opened it and saw the label! Never seen a kids XXL as 11-12 before! SIZES ARE NOT ACCURATE!

Name: eleanor
Title: I order for Christmas and it turned out to be be to small to wear at all during the winter

Name: Lacye
Title: Falling apart after just a month of wear

Name: Tatiania McCall
Title: Fits too small!
Review: I purchased this coat for my daughter whose 12. I picked the right size for her. However, when it arrived and she tried it on, it fit really small. I will not purchase another one.

Name: Ray Higginbotham
Title: FALLING APART

Name: Amber Gummo
Title: IS NOT TRUE TO SIZE

Name: KW
Title: Super cute but thin as paper

Name: A. Nitzschke
Title: Cheaply made
Review: Color was pretty but. This coat was listed as a down coat. I thought it would be a heavy warm coat, but it is very light weight and cheaply made. Not worth the price I paid for it!

Name: Margot29
Title: El producto no es 100% poliester
Review: El producto no es 100% poliester, no cubre la ni√±a del fr√≠o en su totalidad, me siento muy bien con el m√≠o, pero con este estoy muy decepcionada.

Name: jessica daves
Title: Not the best quality
Review: The whole jacket feels cheap and like plastic!

Name: Toney
Title: Not warm
Review: We were expecting a little bit a thicker coat. This was so thin my daughter never wore it because it didn‚Äôt warm her at all. Sure, maybe it would have kept rain out, but you would still freeze to death. So you‚Äôd be dry and dead.

Name: Sara D.
Title: Very thin and easily torn
Review: This is a jacket. It is not very thick and the material is so thin that it tore very easily when my daughter was putting the jacket on. The design is cute but it‚Äôs not worth the cost.

Name: Yan Kabakov
Title: Poorly made
Review: It is a beautiful jacket, but poorly made for a big price. I had to return it.

Name: Kindle Customer
Title: Sizing is way off....
Review: Bought an XL for my 9 year old daughter, who normally wears size 10 to 12 in girls.  XL was skintight, would have had to go up to XXL to fit.  Plus, the fit was weird, arms too long and skinny, overall length too long for a jacket.  Would not buy again.

Name: Dama Hickey
Title: Disappointed
Review: Love the color but was really disappointed that it had a another kids name already wrote in the jacket so if was obviously used. Sent back to Amazon.

Name: Valerie
Title: Not as warm as expected
Review: Based on reviews, had high expectations. Looked nice on her but was very thin. Would work for chilly days but not cold days. We needed COLD day coverage so we returned.

Name: Ms.Charm
Title: too thin
Review: i bought two of these jackets for my daughters, one in the mushroom design and the other in the green vine flowers. they arrived at the right time and they are super cute and soft but the downer is they are most definitely too too too thin and did not keep my girls warm this morning at the bus stop and its only fall weather we're dealing with. my oldest ended up running back to the house and getting her and her sisters sweatshirts :( broke my heart and my wallet. neat carrying case though, guess that explains why they're so thin lol. but the fun alone in watching my girls struggle to stuff their jackets in the sacks .... priceless ... i will be keeping them though for maybe spring weather lol

Name: Amy Martinez
Title: Very thin
Review: It is likely my own fault for missing something in the description but I was expecting this to be a full on winter jacket. It is not. It is very think, though still very cute.

Name: Samantha Jenkins
Title: Not a warm winter coat
Review: This is a nice coat, but made for fall weather. It won't be warm enough for cold winter temps. I liked the little bag that holds a hat or mittens.

Name: cindy webb
Title: it was ok ,
Review: i like the way it fit my grandchild but i did not like that it is so light in weight and not very warm for the price

Name: Heather Miller
Title: Super cute but super small
Review: Look, my daughter is a bit big for her age (7) but typically wears size 10/12 shirts.  The Large jacket was barely zippable and the XL was not even 1 inch wider than the L.  No idea how the XL could fit most 14 year olds I see.  This is soooo cute and well made but why do all little girls clothes have to be so slim cut, what is this telling them!? I got a similar Gap kids down jacket in size M and it's perfect with room.  Come on Amazon, disappointed.

Name: Kristin F
Title: Cute, but sized poorly
Review: We have purchased several of these coats over the last few years for our 3 toddlers, however this one while just as cute seemed to be sized weird. The arms were way too short. Had to return.

Name: Amy Troyna
Title: Size up!
Review: Runs small, my daughter said there was no stretch in the arms and she was uncomfortable wearing it. The jacket itself was adorable and very lightweight; it would be great to keep in a backpack or the car, if only it ran true to size!

Name: Rich
Title: Too small for stated size
Review: Very small for the size range that it says it's for. I have 2 girls 8 and 9 one is a string bean and the other one pretty average. Size 10 and 12 respectively. I bought two of them and they are both kinda small . I ever ordered the next size up in hopes that it would fit them for more than one season. No luck. It will fit for 2 months and then in the hand me down bin they go.

Name: Anime Nut
Title: Not an xxl
Review: It barely fits my daughter at an XXL.  The sleeves are long enough but it's tight on her when I zip it up.

Name: Hazel
Title: More like a spring jacket, not for autumn.
Review: Good points:-The jacket is lightweight and packable.-Nice color (We got the ombre one.)-Quick shippingBad points:-Material is thin. More suited as a spring jacket. Will not withstand Chicago's fall and winter weather.I will return this.

Name: NLM4501
Title: Jacket runs small
Review: Received the jacket today for my 8 year old granddaughter and  tried it on immediately.  Very tight fit and would not be able to zip if she had on a sweater or sweatshirt underneath.  I had read several reviews that said it ran small but decided a large would be safe for an 8 year old.  She is wearing 10 if individually sized but I do buy 10/12 if that sizing is available.  Usually works fine but this time it didn't.  The quality seemed nice and is exactly what I was looking for for our usually mild North Carolina winters.  Have started my return an exchange for an X Large.  If a little big that's OK so we can possibly get longer use out of it.  Saw some comments on quality but keep in mind this is a $20 item not an Eddie Bauer packable down jacket for a lot more $$$$$  As a reference my granddaughter is 67.6 lbs and 4ft 3-1/4 inches tall and this jacket was definitely too small.  Arm length ok but tight across shoulders .

Name: norma
Title: Muy peque√±o
Review: El jacket le qued√≥ muy peque√±a el size 12

Name: SP
Title: Cute
Review: Love it. Just perfect for my toddler. Can use for two winters.

Name: Shannon McGhee
Title: Smaller, slimmer, shorter arms than expected
Review: I purchased this jacket as a ski jacket for my granddaughter who is a slim 10-12. I ordered a size large. The jacket fit snuggly with a bulky sweatshirt underneath.  If I could change anything about this jacket, the arms would be 2 inches longer and the jacket length would be 2 inches longer and the sides would be a little less fitted. My granddaughter wore the jacket skiing with a long sleeve shirt and a sweatshirt underneath and she was plenty warm. I had to be careful not to pull the sleeves of her shirt and sweatshirt down past the wrist of the jacket or they would have been very wet from the snow.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Lightweight Jacket
Review: I really like this jacket but it ran a bit small.

Name: Lindsey
Title: Runs very small, size up two!
Review: Adorable jacket.  I ordered two for my girls but of course they were both too small, luckily I was able to keep one and switch the smallest for a bigger biggest size because Amazon did me dirty and charged me for a price change since the coats were on sale when I bought them, even though they had the sizing wrong online, and all I was trying to do was exchange sizing.  So they jackets run very small, I sized up two for my girls, but they're an adorable light weight jacket.

Name: April Funk
Title: Lightweight great fit
Review: Light weight warmth adaptable coat. Pretty color and nice fit. Zipper is tricky for both kids, but feel like they will adjust to it.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Cute but on the smaller side
Review: I bought the large for my almost 9 year old daughter and it just barely fits. I bought a medium in the boys‚Äô version of the same jacket for my 6 1/2 year old boy and it‚Äôs slightly bigger than the girls large. My son is swimming in it. So the girls jackets are on the small side and the boys are large. Other than that these jackets are cute and warm. They look nice!

Name: sj
Title: Super Cute but very small across chest
Review: This item is so cute, bought for my 2 kiddos. Read the reviews so I sized up. I should have sized up, 2 sizes. Length was good and belly room was fine too but the chest was very tight with no stretch.Great Quality and perfect little light jacket but size up for sure. I will return and repurchase :)

Name: Kimberly Murphy
Title: Great jacket
Review: Jacket is just as described. Great for that transitional weather of fall and spring. There is no fleece, which is what I preferred. My 5 year is around wears a size 5 and if fit her. I ordered a small to give her room to wear it again in the spring and maybe next Fall. It fits well without looking too big

Name: Mandi
Title: Great Jacket
Review: I bought this jacket for my 8 1/2 year old. The large fits her well, a little big but not too big. I was afraid that the medium would be too small and I think I was right.  This jacket feels very thin but with it being a puffer jacket I‚Äôm sure it will be plenty warm. I wasn‚Äôt looking for a snow coat and we live in the south.  The navy flower pattern is so cute in person. My daughter is very happy.

Name: Kali G.
Title: Amazon brands = amazing!
Review: I have always loved buying Amazon brands for smaller household items but took a risk buying my first clothing item made by Amazon and needless to say I am blown away by the quality. My toddler loves this jacket, lightweight yet warm enough for Alabama winters. The little hood is kind of rounded in so it stays on her head without constantly sliding off as well as keeps the cold out. Definitely recommend!!

Name: Justin Core
Title: Perfect layering jacket
Review: My daughter goes to an outdoor school so she needs layers. This is perfect for our mild winter days with an extra layer or 2 under it for colder days. It's very well made and is holding up to rough forest play very well.

Name: Sarah P
Title: Perfect kids coat
Review: I was on the hunt for a light weight yet warm coat for my 5 year old. Found this one and decided to try it out. So glad I did- it‚Äôs warm without being super bulky and it‚Äôs easy for my daughter to carry- even fits in her backpack!

Name: Mary Beth Howard
Title: Great light weight winter coat
Review: I was impressed with the quality of the coat for the price. It is medium warmth but not bulky at all and my kid loves it. Comes with a handy bag for packing

Name: LaVaun Nelson
Title: We purchased this a a give away to a needy girl in your community.
Review: It was a very lovely coat to be given to a girl in my community.‚ò∫Ô∏è

Name: Elizabeth
Title: Practical and cute for her

Name: Nora
Title: Great value for the money, perfect fall jacket
