Review: Four year old loves the footie PJs!!

Name: William Martin
Title: They fit my daughter well and keep her warm
Review: Product fits well. Provides warm to my daughter

Name: M.E
Title: Used jacket
Review: I bought two jackets for my daughter. A blue and  ivory, the ivory colored jacket unfortunately was sent to me used. Had no tag, stains all over. The inside has black fibers I‚Äôm assuming form layering of other clothing and had hairs inside the jacket. If it wasn‚Äôt for that it‚Äôs a nice jacket fits true to size. Was very disappointed as we were going on a trip and had made my order just in time for our trip but once I opened it and saw it made me mad and disappointed.

Name: Alicia Gordon
Title: Please do not buy this coat.
Review: This coat started off being a beautiful item, but out of nowhere, it ripped under the arm.  It did not have any pre-existing holes or tears.  My child put it on earlier that day and stored it in the cubby at school.  There were no holes in the item as my husband put the coat on that we could see. There is absolutely no way to fix it.  I would like to add this is the 2nd coat that has done this so buyers please beware. Now I have to go out to find a coat today due to the wintry weather we are scheduled to have.

Name: Alina J
Title: Lasted barely a year
Review: Had this jacket for a year for my daughter who is 5. The first wash the inside of the pocket tore. And after every wash it tore more in different spots. I don‚Äôt put it in the dryer, air dry only. But still disappointed.

Name: Kimberly Brown
Title: Cheap material
Review: Just received this jacket today. As soon as I opened the snaps the fabric ripped. Not sure how to return as I've never had to return anything before and I've already taken the tags off.

Name: Andrew
Title: Poorly made
Review: There were threads hanging off after washed. Some of the stitching was not even. Like the machine was having hiccups or something. Very disappointed since I've bought other things from this brand and I expected the same quality. Won't be buying this jacket again.

Name: Alexandre M.
Title: Buyer Beware
Review: Love the look of this jacket. However the jacket we received was clearly used (scuffed snaps, stains, small rip, a child‚Äôs full name written on the jacket label)! Also you purchased the same style for my son - his jacket arrived and smelled overwhelmingly of cigarette smoke. Ick. I purchased these both new. So disappointed in the quality control.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Stains SO easily
Review: First wear in the snow, and it‚Äôs now so stained from dirt that we can‚Äôt wear it anymore. Washed 3x with oxiclean spray on the stains, and not one area of stain lifted. Highly disappointed

Name: Eric
Title: Poor quality
Review: We love the coat but after a few uses this winter the coat ripped across the seam. It was purchased for a Christmas gift so our return window has closed since we purchased in September but we have only used the coat for about 3 weeks before the seem split.

Name: KSP
Title: Poor quality
Review: My daughter has been wearing this coat for less than 2 months an it‚Äôs already falling apart. She is not hard on her clothing and we are very disappointed in the quality of this product. We are 10 days past the window for return.

Name: William Jones
Title: Not new!! Very dirty!
Review: Paid  full price for a brand new jacket and it‚Äôs CLEARLY used.

Name: Kelly Wiegele
Title: Not great quality but very cute
Review: This jacket was very cute and fit well but the one we received was ripped about 3 inches along the seam in the back-see photos. üòû

Name: Emily D.
Title: Sizing didn't work for us
Review: The sizing on this jacket just did not work for us. My 5.5 yo felt the size small was too snug- it was. The underarms were pinched and the jacket short. The size medium was too big with arms too long and an overall snug feel. Unfortunately it is going back despite the lovely print.

Name: Annie
Title: Armpit hole after two months
Review: Hole in the armpit after 2 months of wearing. Usually, I get North Face jackets for my kids...three daughters so they can pass them down. I‚Äôve never had a jacket wear out, and  all three girls wear them for a year before donating them. I tried an Amazon jacket this year for my oldest because the reviews were good and the price is so much better. Unfortunately, the quality is terrible. Huge hole in the armpit after 2 months of light wear. Very disappointing.

Name: Paula R.
Title: Runs way too small!!!
Review: Granddaughter loved coat. Probably won‚Äôt fit very long at all. Order UP at least one if not TWO sizes. Hope this helps ü§ó

Name: lindsay lewis
Title: Disappointed in the warmth
Review: Not designed for winter snow. fall weather, yes.

Name: Elida Alvarez
Title: If warm enough for cool weather
Review: Not thick enough

Name: Cori
Review: Ich habe diese Jacke aus purer Neugierde bestellt ... Daune f√ºr 25 ‚Ç¨ , echt  ???  Nat√ºrlich nicht !!!‚òùüèªIn dieser Jacke befindet sich mit Sicherheit weder eine einzige Daune geschweige denn eine einzige Feder.üëçüèªDie Jacke ist auch nicht schwer, sondern recht leicht. Man k√∂nnte es "federleicht" nennen.Alleine f√ºr diese Irref√ºhrung h√§tte die Jacke keinen einzigen Stern verdient.Meinen Ausgangsplan, sie zur√ºck zu senden, habe ich jedoch dennoch verworfen , weil:- sie sehr sauber und gut gen√§ht ist- sie trotzdem sch√∂n warm h√§lt- nicht beschwert- innen einen "Windfang" innen, wie eine  Skijacke, zum  ‚Äãzukn√∂pfen hat d.h. die K√§lte zieht nicht am ‚ÄãR√ºcken hoch- die B√ºndchen Daumenl√∂cher haben- der Rei√üverschlu√ü solide sowie  leichtg√§ngig ist- die Jacke in einem sch√∂nen Rosa, wie abgebildet, ist- sie insgesamt an sich recht h√ºbsch ist‚Äã- gr√∂√üengerecht ausf√§llt--> meine Tochter total begeistert war.F√ºr Regen oder N√§sse ist sie jedoch nicht geeignet.Zusammenfassend:Wer eine preisg√ºnstige (25‚Ç¨) h√ºbsche, recht solide, warme (Zweit,Dritt-)Jacke f√ºr die kalte Jahreszeit sucht ist hier, trotz der falschen Deklarierung, ganz gut beraten.

Name: vallon
Review: Le manteau n'est pas solide, a peine 1 mois et d√©ja des coutures qui c√®dent.la qualit√© n'est pas au rendez vous.

Name: Adrienne Peterson
Title: Great, at first!
Review: We loved this coat upon arrival! We love the options for zip and snap, and the internal and band is great. My daughter‚Äôs had the coat for about two weeks and the zipper is completely broken. The pull broke off and the zip piece won‚Äôt come back down from the top. Luckily, I can still snap it so that she can wear it. She gets tons of compliments since the print is so cute and the fit is superb. Oh, and we love the thumb holes!! I just wish we could get a new one or the zipper pull fixed. I‚Äôm frustrated that we had it for such a short time and it‚Äôs already broken.

Name: Kindle Customer
Title: Cute, but Way too small!
Review: It looks cute, but is probably 2 sizes too small. My daughter is almost 10 & I ordered an XL. She's slim, but very tall. I would need 2 sizes bigger for it to be comfortable.

Name: SomethingBlue12
Title: Not good for very cold weather
Review: Once received, the coat seemed OK for maybe 40-50 degree F weather. Definitely will not be suitable for a midwest winter. Once we got the coat there was a hole it it where one of the buttons snap. Gave a 3 star because it has served her well in the meantime.

Name: Yellowrose
Title: Size up
Review: I ordered a large she's 6 yrs old the coat runs small and not so roomy with her clothes underneath.

Name: Sarah Baez
Title: Sizing is off
Review: I ordered two of these for my daughters - one in xl that was a size up for my daughter and one 2t that‚Äôs her normal size. The xl was way too small and the 2t was too big. Overall I liked the coats - there is an elastic lining around where it would hit their waist, however I will be returning them due to sizing.

Name: Marielle
Title: Good for cold but not for snow
Review: The coat is good for cold but not the snow. The outside really holds the water when it gets wet. Not good for playing in the snow. The coat ends up getting logged with water on the outside and then kiddos start to get cold.

Name: Casey B.
Title: Daughter looks like a linebacker with shoulder pads
Review: Coat quality seems fine it‚Äôs just very boxy and has the look of having large shoulder pads.  Which is a little much for a two year old. Lol.Not my favorite.

Name: Liane
Title: Decent coat
Review: We loved our last coat like this so I bought the next size up for my 8 year old this winter. This coat is coming apart at the seams, maybe I got a bad one.

Name: Veldatheresa
Title: Girls coat
Review: I like the color of the coat. The only thing is it fitted. I didn't realize that when I brought the coat.

Name: Anonymous
Title: NOT HEAVYWEIGHT & RUNS SMALL
Review: I purchased this as a gift. This coat arrived and I was surprised to see it in such a small package as the description says the coat is "heavyweight", I was expecting a larger package. Although the design is cute, this jacket is NOT heavyweight and seems to run a bit small. Hopefully the recipient finds it warm.

Name: TScags
Title: This was a gift for an unknown child
Review: This was a gift for an unknown child

Name: Ali Shea
Title: Nice Jacket but Stinky!
Review: We live in Northern Minnesota so I don't expect this to get used much in January and February but right now, temps are hovering around 30 with some snow here and there (yes, in October) and it does the job. My daughter likes the hood and and the weight and the thumbholes on the interior sleeves but HATED the smell when we unpackaged it. I'm not kidding you, it was awful. I had to convince her that I got the smell out after washing it because she didn't want to touch it again. Good jacket, stinky out of the package.

Name: PHB
Title: Runs small, size up
Review: Nice basic cold weather jacket. It runs small so recommend sizing up. I ordered the XL and XXL for my slender 11-year-old girl, and the XXL (14-16) fit like a size 12 - roomy fit that she can maybe wear next year too. The XL (12) fit more like a size 10.

Name: Josh
Title: Quality for sure
Review: Love this, looks great, fits right, and my kid did warm as can be.

Name: Kat R
Title: Good coat
Review: It fit my 3 year old well with room to grow. However, I did return it because it was a little more ivory yellow than I expected.

Name: Linee7B
Title: Cute, nice colors, good fit, soft, cozy...just not sure about quality of materials.
Review: Cute, nice colors, good fit, soft, cozy...just not sure about quality of materials. I was afraid this would not wash well and hold stains; so I returned it. My daughter loved the comfort of it, but it didn't have much growing room for extended use.

Name: johana chacon hoyos
Title: Bueno, bonito y barato.
Review: Es bonita, c√≥moda y abrigadora.Mi hija es un poquito gruesita y alta, tiene 8 a√±os, ped√≠ una XL, le qued√≥ un poquito grande, pero se ve bien.

Name: Professorowl
Title: Great jacket with a design flaw...
Review: This is a nice winter jacket. My daughter said that it keeps her warm in the cold weather, and even though it is a "puffy" jacket, she said she has no problem swinging on the monkey bars or climbing up trees. She also likes the zipper guard feature located at the top of the zipper because it protects her neck and under her chin from getting scratched by the zipper handle. The hood offers nice coverage and stays on even in windy conditions. This jacket also goes well with the Amazon Basics snowpants. The jacket is true to size, but if you want to size up one size (like we did), the jacket will still fit all right, especially because it is quite "puffy," so it doesn't look quite as big as thinner jackets might.The jacket tends to dry quickly EXCEPT for the cuffs. This is why I took off one star. The cuffs are absolutely awful! I think the designer(s) thought they were adding a modern and "cool" feature to the jacket by making cuffs that resemble the cuff design of the thin, stretchy long-sleeve shirts with the thumb holes. Unfortunately, this "cool" feature does not dry quickly (like the rest of the jacket), so when my kiddo plays outside in the snow, the cuffs are soaking wet for hours afterwards. I wish they had made the cuffs out of the same quick-dry nylon fabric as the rest of the outside of the jacket. Even with this flaw, I would still recommend this jacket.

Name: Amber Beront
Title: Great garment...at what price?
Review: My 7 year old daughter and i are both very happy with this coat. The material and construction are good quality. Attention to detail is great:-sleeve interior is slippery fabric, which is nice for kids!-thumb holes in sleeves-Fleecy interior of coat and the zip up pockets makes this jacket cozy.-Extra long in the back keeps the bum warm and dry.-Zip guard at neck really pleases my daughter's chin and the hood goes up without choking her while fully zipped!-there is an interior slip proof belt to keep out snow and keep the jacket in place over snowpants...Everything about this jacket is great except for three things:1. No color choices. Only came in navy with pink interior.2. Amazon does not treat its employees well or pay well and i have to wonder about the ethics of this garment.3. Amazon paid no taxes last year on their profits, which also harm the ethics of this garment.Anyone concerned with economic stability should think long and hard before buying amazon essentials products. How can they offer this fine of a product for this great price without compromising their employees well being and our economic stability?

Name: Kathleen M. Machacek
Title: Nice warm coat but does look dirty after washing
Review: This is a nice coat for a child that is active. It does a wonderful job of keeping my daughter warm and she loves the colors. I‚Äôve washed it twice but it did look dirty afterwards, like kind of a muddy look. This is a good play coat for outside, but I wouldn‚Äôt want her to wear it to a nice occasion.

Name: Nikki Burch
Title: Great winter jacket!!
Review: Really nice and comfy winter jacket. Not too thick but definitely not thin!My daughter is almost 9 and I got her a large which was perfect.My son is 7 and the medium was HUGE so I exchanged it for a small.These jackets are super soft and comfy. They are super sturdy with a big heavy duty zipper and a lot of buttons to secure it. Wish they made one in adult size. I bought them for 60% off so they were about $25 each and it is definitely the best value ever! Even at $40 I still would‚Äôve purchased and loved! Definitely recommend.

Name: Raising RoseGold
Title: Great quality
Review: Love all of the features! Thumb holes, zip up and snap up, hood, and waterproof liner snap on the inside to reduce water from getting inside while child is sitting. We got the size small. Little one is 39lbs, and is 44 inches tall. Its a tad big on her but will be able to wear next season as well.

Name: LoSa
Title: Impressed!
Review: I am so impressed with this adorable coat. Usually Amazon Essentials is decent quality/ no frills. Perfect for kids who grow so fast and you're only using these items for a couple months. But I gotta say, I am really impressed with this coat! The pictures don't do it justice. Zip pockets, there's a strap inside to help keep it from riding up, zipper and snaps, and my favorite is that the sleeve has a little hidden piece that they can put their thumbs into so when the put on gloves, there isn't that glove/coat gap where their little wrists get super cold or filled with snow. For the same price at Carters, or less than the athletic brands like Nike, this one is def a big win.

Name: Twila Hall
Title: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê
Review: This is an adorable jacket the lining is warm, nice and thick love that the cuffs have the slit for my granddaughter's thumb to go through to keep the sleeves down and cold off her fingersI would buy this again

Name: Leslie Jackson
Title: Perfecccccct Great material soft as cotton durable I love it and I'm very hard to please .
Review: Soft as cotton but very warm and durable my girl is a little chunky large fit her perfect and she's about 115lbs .I'm very hard to please and I was blown away by this Great Coat .

Name: Crystal Taylor
Title: Amazing quality
Review: A little large on my toddler, but the extra room is probably good for bigger kids layering underneath.  Amazing coat!

Name: Gen Swan
Title: Great buys and all I expected however they're Christmas gifts that I'm positive will fit well.
Review: I am convinced  these are warm, toasty coats. My two grandsons and a niece will love them!!! Thank you.

Name: Amanda Commisso
Title: Just like Fei Fei!
Review: Got this in the silver. My 3yo loves it because it looks like fei fei's jacket in over the moon! Also happens to be very cozy and seems well made. Love the little waist and wrist fittings as well. Just keeps everything nice and insulated. Really happy with it.

Name: Natalie Griffiths
Title: Lovely Warm Winter Coat
Review: My daughter loves this coat! The yellow color is so pretty and helps me spot her in a crowd. This isn‚Äôt a lightweight coat it‚Äôs definitely a warm winter coat. I‚Äôm not quite sure it‚Äôs 100% waterproof but it did great for her playing out in the snow. It is true to size, I bought a 4T and that‚Äôs the size of clothes she wears right now and it works great.

Name: Jocelyn
Title: Perfect winter coat
Review: I bought one last year for my then five year old and it kept her warm all through the winter even playing out in the snow. So this year I bought one from my two year old. Lined inside, buttons around waist, zips and snaps closed, even has thumb holds. Highly recommend this jacket. I plan on this being our go to coat as long as they keep making them.

Name: Aubrey
Title: Poor design
Review: There is no material protecting baby's skin from the zipper. The only way she can wear this is if it's layered over something, defeating the purpose. Awful design. I am returning this and I hope this review saves someone else the same hassle.

Name: Brooke
Title: Only 2 Pajamas
Review: This would have been really nice, but I only recived 2 pajamas out of the 3 advertised? And my only options is to return what I received. Kind of a bummer. Make sure to check your package.

Name: Mr. Tech
Title: Poor packaging
Review: I love Carter's products. These PJs are great, and I'll probably order more. However, mine was shipped without any packaging aside from it's original clear plastic bag. I do not consider this sufficient to protect my purchase from the elements. Nor do I want everyone else in the universe to know what arrives at my residence, no matter how inconsequential the purchase may seem to the seller. Also, I think they are supposed to notify you if something is supposed to arrive in it's original packaging or display the contents. Hence, the one star review.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Doesn‚Äôt feel like it‚Äôs from carter!
Review: Rough fabric, not soft as other clothes from carter. Doesn‚Äôt feel like it‚Äôs from carter. Colors look cheap too

Name: Rachel
Title: Zipper on inside is so tough and scratchy!!
Review: I can not believe the thousands of 5 star reviews on this - unless of course the design has changed. There is no soft backing to cover the inside zipper. It‚Äôs very scratchy and leaves little red marks on the skin. We as adults wouldn‚Äôt like it - so why would they do it for a baby? I usually like Carter‚Äôs products but this is one not to buy! They usually put a soft backing on the zippers. Disappointing!

Name: Rcubed
Title: Don‚Äôt waste your money
Review: I drop my daughter off at my mom‚Äôs really early in the morning. So I bought these pjs for the cold morning we have during our ‚ÄúFlorida winters.‚Äù My daughter is 2.5 and wears 2T in mostly everything. I got these in 3T so they could be roomier Andre last longer. They run small IMO. What‚Äôs worse is that each pjs is a different size. They all say 3T but run very differently. Only the pink fox fits her good. The other two are too short and tight around her thighs. One much more than the other, I forgot which. So I bought these and was only able to use two of them once because it was too tight around the shoulder area since the length was short. So disappointed. By the time I went to use them I was out of the return policy. Money down the drain.

Name: Nancy Nobles
Title: Would never buy again
Review: They ran too small . No give to them . I wouldn't recommend them.

Name: Mom of 10
Title: Image is not what you get! Instead of soft colors, I got highligther/neon colors.
Review: Just got them today. I was excited until I opened the bag it was shipped in. Disappointed! Hot pink (hearts), neon pinky orange (superhero), the cocoa one I'm not sure since it's packed in the middle and I don't want to open it. I'm returning this trio. I guess I'm spending more money on another set from company B.

Name: briar
Title: WAAAY too small in the leg areas
Review: Loved how soft and cute these onesies were, but they are cut waaaaaaay too narrow in the leg area. It was a struggle to get them on my daughter and they left marks on her skins where it was too restrictive on the ankles and thighs. Shes 26 inches and 19 pounds and we got the 12 month size. Really wanted these to fit since they were so cute and soft. If they fit your baby they are great, but I don't see how they could fit a standard 12 month old sized kid with how narrow the legs are cut.

Name: Daniela
Title: Muy mala calidad
Review: Es un pollo muy mala calidad y delgado, mi hija lo usa inmediatamente est√° sudando, prefiero no usarlos ya que no s√© qu√© material son parece un pl√°stico de la forma en que hace sudar a mi hija, no tiene nada que ver con los productos Carter‚Äôs

Name: Sky
Title: too large
Review: Very large, my granddaughter only weighs 16 lbs. this is very long n big all over.

Name: Jessica C
Title: Cheap
Review: These are perfect but one of them had a ripped seam after only one wash.

Name: Grandma
Title: Sent wrong size. I ordered 3T got 4T
Review: The quality is what I expected

Name: Cardinal Rule
Title: Beware!
Review: I purchased these as a gift for a beloved baby‚Äôs birthday. I loved the colors and patterns to choose from. The description stated Carter‚Äôs polyester pajamas were naturally flame resistant so I felt safe purchasing them. Carter‚Äôs had always been a trusted brand and offered lovely products. When I received my order I was shocked to see a prominent label inside stating ‚ÄúKeep away from fire‚Äù!  Who wants to give parents baby nightwear with a frightening tag like that! It certainly did not give me confidence that the product was flame retardant! I returned them and I am very disappointed in Carter‚Äôs.

Name: Dia
Title: When  I received items , they were huge.Had to return.
Review: Too big for my 2 and half year old.

Name: Gretchen Cram
Title: Fabric terrible
Review: the fabric is terrible, scratchy, polyester

Name: Bgrega
Title: Not as pictured
Review: These are good quality clothes, and I already know they run big, however this time (first time) they are not even close to as pictured. They are neon in color and the print is blurry. Would not recommend this specific set.

Name: Pamela Olson
Title: These were somehow both too thin and too hot (and too small)
Review: They kinda work for running around a cold house, but they're not stretchy enough for comfortable sleep and my daughter sweats like crazy in them at night. And they seemed to shrink up and just generally aren't very stretchy, forgiving, or as comfy as I hoped. My girl is pretty average, and I have to stuff her into these things.

Name: Sue Hill
Title: Fabric isn‚Äôt breathable and our baby overheats
Review: Our granddaughter wont wear these.  We‚Äôve tried them and washed them a few times and re-tried them.  She ends up peeling them off after about 20 minutes.  She doesn‚Äôt do this with any of her other onesies.  These fit her nicely and are comfortable for her to move in; they stretch and bend nicely.  It seems that when she‚Äôs peeling these off its because her skin is clammy and she feels too hot. I think this fabric doesn‚Äôt breathe.  It feels soft but I note that it is made in China and is synthetic.  Whatever the weave is doesn‚Äôt allow for any breathability.  Our baby granddaughter can‚Äôt stand the smothered feeling from these.  So we are going to look for some other brand than Carters.  Sad - we always used Carters with her mom when she was growing up.  We found some Burts Bees cotton pj‚Äôs and we‚Äôll try those.

Name: Gregory B
Title: Very skinny legs
Review: These 12 month sleep and plays are awkward fitting. My daughter was in the 9 month sleep and plays but she got too long for them, so I bought these. However, they are really long, the feet are huge, and yet the legs are really skinny... I can barely get my daughter's legs into these. I have 9 month sleep and plays in both fleece and normal material and they both fit perfectly, except the length, there's no problems with her legs being too chuncky. My daughter is at the 70th percentile for both height and weight.

Name: S
Title: run small
Review: these run small in my opinion. I ordered these in 18m and some gerber brand in 18m. I ended up returning these becuse they were almost skin tight, where as the Gerber's had plenty of wiggle room. to bad because these are super cute and nice and thick to keep baby warm at night in the crib without a blanket. next time I will order a size up.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: The feet nubs are like plastic.
Review: The nubby graps on the bottom of the feet are like smooth, slick, plastic. My baby slips and slides and falls from no grip or traction. It makes her look like she's trying to ice skate.

Name: s zherebnenkov
Title: Sleeves are too short.
Review: They‚Äôre great except for one major drawback. The sleeves are short and through the night they ride up and die to the hemming, it‚Äôs hard to pull them down. It‚Äôs too stiff. No stretch in the edge of the sleeve which is very uncomfortable for my baby. Yes it makes the pajama ‚Äúcuter‚Äù, but functionality suffers.

Name: Chantilly
Title: Not a pack of the same sizes!!!!
Review: The quality of these seem great. However, we were supposed to be a pack of 3T. We got 2 3T and one 2T. Will be looking for a return or replacement.

Name: Marissa
Title: Not good for babies with chunky legs !
Review: Very hard to zip with my 8 month olds chunky legs. We ordered 12 month and it's still hard to zip them.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Very oversized compared to others by same manufacturer and company maybe mislabeled?
Review: Colors softness and quality appears to be ok but the size was very oversized compared to same brand and manufacturer.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Pasable
Review: Las pijamas son bonitas y calientitas, solo que las piernas y mangas vienen mas ajustadas de lo normal, mi bebe tiene 8 meses y no creo que le dure tanto sus pijamas (las ped√≠ 12-18)

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: very thin
Review: I have always ordered carters sleepers, this was the first time (and last...) I ordered this company, thinking it would be the same. it is not at all... the sleepers are VERY thin- compaired to carters fleece sleepers, and the quality doesnt seem good eather. If I would have known it was like this- I wouldnt have ordered it

Name: Taco Lady
Title: Wow
Review: This has got to be the absolute biggest 4t I have ever seen in my lifeMy God Daughter can't wear these at all znd the 3t she is wearing now we had to cut the feel out of.These 4t's are more than half my size (I'm an adult woman at 5'3") they run a size big. These are most certainly a 5t.By a size smaller if you by from these guys.The pic is them laid out in her toddler bed for scale.

Name: Calina Anderson
Title: Great soft and warm!
Review: Great for keeping baby warm at night. Soft fleece feels very warm and comfy. The only issue is the dark blue sleeper keeps turning my LOs foot blue. The color is bleeding out and I‚Äôve washed it many times. I‚Äôve ordered two three packs of these and that is the only one that has had an issue.

Name: Stacee l Johnson
Title: Children sleepers
Review: Great product for children. Non restrictive material

Name: TWNicholson
Title: P.J.s
Review: Keeps her warm fit good happy

Name: Kahtrina
Title: Order a size Down
Review: These are great quality. Cute & warm. They do run very large so order a size smaller than you normally would. I do recommend tho! I had to return & reorder due to size & refund & new order was processed very timely with no problems.

Name: Acacia Laidlaw
Title: Perfect For Cold nights
Review: love these always buy them for my daughter! They're warm and have grips on the bottom of the feet so she won't slip while walking or running. Keeps het warm throughout the night.

Name: Ryan L.
Title: Great price, doesn‚Äôt stay soft for long
Review: These are great warm PJs. Sadly they‚Äôre not very soft anymore after many washes but you can‚Äôt expect much when it‚Äôs so cheap!

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Forget the Haters
Review: I‚Äôm not sure why so many reviews are bad for these. I have struggled to find fleece sleepers this time of year (April) for my 6.5 month old who wears 6-9/9M currently. Her room is extremely cold, so she needs fleece under her sleep sack at night. She is in the 75th percentile for height (27.5 in currently), and with her large overnight diaper and owlet we use on her foot, I planned to go up a size in whatever I found. With the other reviews saying how small these run, I ordered 12M and 18M just to be safe (and planned to send whichever back that didn‚Äôt work). I‚Äôm happy to report that the 12M work just fine, and they are even roomie for her! They are definitely too long, but everywhere else they fit great. I don‚Äôt want her pajamas to be tight anyway, and it allows plenty of room for her overnight diaper. I‚Äôm happy that they will fit for a while and she also won‚Äôt grow out of them in a couple months. It‚Äôs not an issue to be that there is extra fabric just at her feet.Overall they are very soft and warm. The flannel isn‚Äôt the highest quality flannel in the entire world, but I am satisfied. She will get good use out of these! The only thing I will say is that I think they are priced a little too high in my opinion, but I was happy to find any fleece pjs at this point and was willing to pay.For reference, she is 18.5 lbs and 26.5‚Äù long. She‚Äôs not super chubby, but she‚Äôs also not thin.

Name: Aliz√©e Gaillard
Title: Amazing pyjama but defect in the foot. Too narrow!
Review: I got these pyjamas for my daughter for colder nights and it‚Äôs perfect!The only down side is that I found in 2 pyjamas that 1 foot only was too narrow, (twice the left foot) so even if it fits her height perfectly, 1 foot is too tight so she can‚Äôt wear it anymore. And my daughter doesn‚Äôt have wide feet. It‚Äôs a defect of the pyjama‚Ä¶

Name: Shannan
Title: Cute and soft
Review: I got these for my little during the cold winter months. My favorite is the monster design. These are so cute and have kept my little one warm. I have even layered these over her cotton pj‚Äôs if we are going out in the bitter cold.

Name: Walter Rodriguez
Title: Great product
Review: I did like it

Name: Ambrosia Sirback
Title: Soft and true to size. Looked huge but fit perfectly
Review: Very nice. Better than I expected. Will order again in larger size for next year.

Name: Kacey
Title: 4yo onesies
Review: I have a 2 yo & 4yo. 2yo just stated to were all her hand me down warm pajamas for MI winters. 4yo got super jealous and would cry at night because she wanted the same ones. Thank god they still have them in 4t. Thought zipping would be a problem for peeing but so far no issues

Name: Patricia M
Title: Love these footies!
Review: I purchased a set of these footies when my granddaughter was 3 and she wore them daily. Now that she's 4 I purchased a new set. She LOVES them!! My daughter bought her another set in different patterns. I'm sure as she gets bigger we'll be buying more!

Name: Becca Fish
Title: Cute and soft but a little big
Review: These pjs are super cute and very soft inside and out. However they do run large. My 18 month old usually wears a 2t and I wanted a looser fit, so I ordered her a 2t and double checked with the size chart. They fit more like a 3t or maybe even a 4t. I would size down.

Name: RGN
Title: Well made
Review: We purchased these for our grand daughter.  She wore them the night she received them, so it appears it meets her approval.  We were happy with the quality, but have ordered similar pj's before from Carter's and have always been happy with their products.  Highly recommend them.

Name: Elizabeth Pence
Title: Winter jammies
Review: Our weather here changed so quickly this season that there was virtually no time to prepare the baby wardrobe. My son told me my granddaughter needed warm pajamas, so I ordered the cutest ones I could find. They don't disappoint.

Name: JCal
Title: Warm and comfy for a toddler
Review: The feet area is pretty spacious. My daughter wears size 11 toddler for shoes and there was still plenty of space left.

Name: Rebecca R.
Title: Gift
Review: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend‚Äôs daughter so I don‚Äôt know.

Name: Lady J
Title: Soft
Review: This onsie is soft and nice.

Name: Amanda
Title: So cute!
Review: Great price for three pajamas. Warm and cute. Washes well too.

Name: Jasmine
Title: Perfect
Review: They are a little big but my girls are a little small alsoü§£. I am fine with them being a little big they can just wear them longer. I‚Äôll be ordering again I‚Äôm sure. It‚Äôs hard to find these in 12 months, that aren‚Äôt paper thin. These are thick and warm .

Name: Christina
Title: The worst quality
Review: I bought these in a size 4 for my daughter who is now potty trained.When they arrived I thought they looked really small but figured since she‚Äôs small maybe they‚Äôll work.Most of the underwear have thread coming apart, the back of the underwear are so small with a very low rise I decided not to even bother trying them on her. The symmetry is also off. They would end up causing a wedgie because the hip and butt shifts so far to the left or right.Overall these are horrible underwear. I‚Äôll never buy Hanes again. I should have known better seeing as all the underwear I‚Äôve ever bought for my family were fruit of the loom.I‚Äôm returning these and will stick with Cat & Jack and fruit of the loom.They aren‚Äôt even worth the $6 sale price on Prime Day.Save your money and buy something else.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Why Did These Arrive In a Re-Sealed Bag all Separated OUT?
Review: I'm not sure if these are used/returned but they did NOT arrive the way the last pack we ordered a couple months ago did - which was rolled up, taped individually and in a sealed Hanes Package. These came in a random, heat sealed re-packaging bag. Gross. Returning

Name: Brit
Title: Never matches the picture.
Review: I have ordered these 3 times now and every time they are a different pattern than advertised. The pattern they send isn‚Äôt cute either.  Then trying to get a replacement of the correct ones, they make you drop off their mistake at UPS, which is about 30 min from me. Wouldn‚Äôt recommend.

Name: Jj
Title: Size 4 fits like 2T AT BEST & skimpy
Review: Runs extremely small. Size 4 maybe would‚Äôve fit a 2yr old & my daughter is average sized. Also they were too skimpy (best way to describe it) - not great coverage or height.

Name: HealthcareWorkaholic
Title: Scratchy, Thin Fabric
Review: We bought these for our toddler and hated them almost as soon as we received them. The fabric is thin and scratchy, even after a wash. The stitching does not hold well together, and after a few washes, they start to fall apart. Would *NOT* recommend

Name: Kindle Customer
Title: Way too small
Review: Not sure if these are actual Hanes underwear. I always buy Hanes for my daughter and never had an issue with the underwear shrinking three sizes too small when washed. Her other Hanes have withheld 30+ washes with normal cotton shrinkage. I bought size 6 and washed them and took them out the dryer and they look like they could fit a 2yo.

Name: Suzanne G.
Title: Deceptive- Item delivered was not item pictured
Review: The underware delivered was not the underware pictured. These are very bikini, not like shown. The patterns and colors are completely different. This underware is not any bigger than her 2/3t underware. So this was a complete waste of $. Do not trust this seller.

Name: mary ervin
Title: Size up and up
Review: Do not recommend because I bought a size 4 in girls for my daughter who wears 4t and they were wayyyy to small.

Name: Hula
Title: Used?
Review: Um, why are these not in the original package? Are these used or returned? I was purchasing brand new underwear and this is how they arrived. They all appear fine so I'm confused why they are packaged like that, but don't feel comfortable enough to let my child use possibly used underwear. No thank you and buyer beware.

Name: Brendan Durbin
Title: Super small
Review: We have purchased these before and they were great. We purchased the same size as last time but this time they were so small they didn't even fit her younger sister. (2yrs younger). Also I bought the unicorn ones and they sent me butterfly ones. All around very disappointing I wish I could return them.

Name: Lori Bell
Title: Didn't receive product as pictured
Review: The underwear quality is as expected.  We received 10 pairs.  However, they are not the color(s) and patterns we anticipated receiving based on the product page.  Little girls tend to like cute things, and I thought we were getting mostly purple, with unicorns, butterflies, and the word "LOVE".  Instead, we received 6 pairs of plain white underwear, 2 pairs of plain peach, 1 pair of plain pink, and 1 pair of plain blue.  Boring.

Name: Megan Donoghue
Title: Runs small
Review: They‚Äôre soft, designs are cute, but they run super small. My toddler barely wears a 3t and the 4 was too small. Disappointed in these.

Name: Emil X
Title: Runs very small
Review: These are not true to size. They run extremely small. Crotch part is very skinny.

Name: Amanda Collins
Title: Shows a good fit but is not
Review: The size is great but the product is not for big booty girls this is more for a flat person.

Name: katie j.
Title: Wasn't the pattern i ordered and i think they were opened
Review: It wasn't the pattern i ordered and i think it was opened 'cuz the panties were taped around papers but they were a good price for a lot of pairs and i don't wanna deal with taking them back so whatever i will just wash them.

Name: Carly Belland
Title: Not what I ordered
Review: I ordered these once and was very happy with them. The second time ordering I chose a different pattern but received the exact same set I ordered the first time. I now have duplicates of each pair. They‚Äôre cute but I wanted new patterns

Name: Britney M Struve
Title: Disappointed
Review: I usually buy Hanes for my kiddos and I'm not sure if I just got a bad batch. But I washed them once and multiple pairs had seams coming out. One paid had a hole so much of the seam was out. Probably won't buy again.

Name: Dmro
Title: Bummed
Review: My daughter was super excited for the unicorn print and getting new underwear but what came was not what was pictured.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Not as expected
Review: The patterns that I got did not match the one shown here. My daughter loves owls and the pictures show 3 pairs of underwear with owls. I received none. Sizes run a little smaller. We are a 4T so I got a size 4 and it‚Äôs tight. Not as soft as expected.

Name: JN Aguilar
Title: Made in Thailand/Made in Vietnam,it matters.!
Review: I ordered size 8 for my daughter not long ago and decided to order again and size up because she's growing. As seen in the picture the white one I ordered before was size 8 and made in Thailand it fits perfectly to her I ordered recently the size 10 as seen in the picture I uploaded. This time it is made in Vietnam. It is smaller than the one I ordered before. I guess it matters on where it is made from. I think they have a different size chart. So beware!

Name: Brenda
Title: Seam is irritating
Review: My 8 yr old daughter complains when wearing these, as the seam on the sides is bulky and leaves marks on her skin. They would be fine without the thick/bulky seam.  Won't buy again.

Name: Meg
Title: Size 4
Review: Bought a size 4 for my kiddo but that's 3 years old but they they are quite snug

Name: J. Lo
Title: Xmas present don't know a thing of this product
Review: Xmas present

Name: Bella Loo
Title: It‚Äôs too thin
Review: I bought it when I saw the price was affordable but it was too thin.if you don‚Äôt mind you can buy it.I won‚Äôt buy it again

Name: Marie
Title: Run big
Review: I've ordered these same size, cut and brand before but these are a little too big. But other than that we love the value

Name: Adriana
Title: Perfectly adequate if I‚Äôd bought the correct size
Review: I had bought different girls underwear for my daughter that was too baggy in the butt, so I ordered a smaller size with these. Shame on me for washing without trying them on her. They are too short and don‚Äôt cover all her butt. The prints seem to be slightly smaller than the solids for some reason, but none of them fit. She‚Äôs age 5 1/2, 43 inches tall, and 34 pounds. She still wears the 2-3T underwear from when she potty trained over 2 years ago. I would have thought the size 4 would be bigger. Maybe I should have bought briefs instead of hipsters.

Name: Jay Jay
Title: Disappointing‚Ä¶not as pictured
Review: It is not the same as the picture shown above.

Name: Tiffany Benton
Title: Different pattern than she wanted
Review: While the description does say styles may vary, when we ordered we chose the unicorn ones. My daughter was not happy with the pattern she received. The package said feel the softness, but the fabric was rough and stiff. We hope they get better after being washed. We are keeping them to avoid the hassle of return, but she was definitely disappointed.

Name: Adrianne Daniel
Title: Good value
Review: Not super soft

Name: Holly Wright
Title: So so
Review: They are a little baggy and she complained of them shifting alot

Name: The Quantum Entangler
Title: Run smaller than most undies--true to pants sizing
Review: I've purchased scores of panties for my little one, who is struggling mightily with toilet training. After getting package after package of princess-branded gruns in the hopes that she'd try harder not to soil them, I gave up and bought these. They actually sent the wrong color, but we didn't arrive at this point by being picky so it was fine. I was surprised that these actually fit like her size 4 pants--snug, she's in size 5/6 now--as opposed to all her other size 4 panties (those 7-packs with characters on them) which are still super baggy and go up to her belly button. It turns out the princesses don't make any difference, so I'm going to stick with these going forward, and hope against hope that soon kids' underwear can stop being a weekly purchase for me.

Name: victoria evelyn
Title: Breathable and comfortable.
Review: These panties are soft and breathable. The only reason I gave  a 4 instead of a 5 is because it appears they have been worn and washed. Will discard and reorder.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Good deal, but poor packaging
Review: I thought it was interesting how the underwear wear literally wrapped around copy paper. Other then that, they seem fine.

Name: ashley
Title: Wrong pattern
Review: This is the 3rd time Ive ordered this underwear on deal. The underwear themselves are great, true to size. But everytime Ive ended up with a pattern I didnt order, and if your child is picky about characters/color you may want to reconsider.

Name: Samantha
Title: Great quality just run too big
Review: I would go down a size they run a little on the larger size but other then that they were great

Name: Monica Mel√©ndez
Title: Good quality
Review: Very good quality and nice colours, soft and comfortable. Unfortunately too big for the size my granddaughter need. Maybe it was my fault

Name: T&T
Title: Just Right
Review: Finally! After trying many brands this works perfectly. The cut is nice and full bottom coverage for my 7 year old. It wound be nice if the inside hip seam was flat. But still good overall. I will reorder.

Name: Leticia
Title: She looks good in it.
Review: My daughter 4 years old,I buy #6, She looks good in it.

Name: Mary
Title: Fit and comfy
Review: Nice product! Like it!

Name: Leslie Hughes
Title: Very 'bikini'
Review: Compared to the previous brand I had purchased, these are very narrow on the sides.  A little more 'bikini' than I wish for a 7 yr old.  She is constantly pulling  up on the sides.  I guess they feel too small.

Name: Mrs. Beefy
Title: great value for smaller women
Review: I like 100% cotton. I wear XS in women's sizes which are hard to find (or very expensive) and these fit great.  However I haven't had them long so not sure how well they will stand up to multiple washings.  The 5 patterns are of course "childish"(unicorns, rainbows, and hearts) - but the other 5 are plain colors.  No one really ever sees my underpants so not a problem

Name: Cheryl F.
Title: These are NOT GIRLS/TODDLERS undies
Review: Just to let y'all know that I have no idea why these were called GIRLS AND TODDLER BRIEFS!THEY ARE WOMANS FOTL UNDIES! Geeze!Very odd. They will not help a toddler potty train as THEY ARE NOT CHILDREN'S UNDIES!But cheaper than buying them at The Walstore AGAIN I PURCHASED SIZE 8 WOMENS UNDIES.Soft and fit well. So glad I found them here! I like the "Model, Spandex, Poly blend" very thin and super soft and comfy.

Name: Gina
Title: Love!
Review: I always order a size or two up because I want her to be comfortable my daughters a 2T but I ordered a 4 and they don‚Äôt fall off of her nor are super snug so it‚Äôs great! I also order up because I want her to be able to use her clothes for longer vs a short amount of time. She‚Äôs had these for a few months now and they still look new.

Name: Smiley
Title: Great product with perfect price
Review: Glad to get this at an awesome price so that we could use it as a donation for a Christmas hope chest. Great quality and sizes available.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: My daughter gave these five stars!
Review: I asked my daughter her opinions on these.  She said they are very soft and stretchy.  They are very comfortable to wear throughout the day and are easy to put on.  They fit very well and are true to size.  Plus they come in a bunch of fun colors and patterns.  We are very pleased!

Name: M
Title: Good Quality
Review: I like these underwear because there not loose or tight, they fit perfect. Also,the designs on the underwear are age appropriate.

Name: Tammy
Title: good quality girls panties
Review: Good quality cotton girls panties.  Appropriate and modest for little girls with cute colors and designs.

Name: Eva Luna's mom
Title: Comfortable and great value
Review: Love the coverage on these panties for my 9 year old. She has a bit of a bum so they cover her nicely. they are comfy and there is no more picking at her pants! Great value, and plenty to get us through until laundry day.

Name: Elon
Title: Great quality
Review: True to size and extremely comfortable‚Ä¶ awesome buy.

Name: Ebony
Title: These are good quality
Review: Love the quantity and the price the girls love them they fit well

Name: Jalpa K
Title: Shrunk terribly- even after ordering a larger size. Will not buy again
Review: Material is good and cotton- which was important to me but it went down 1 or 2 sizes after washing- so basically are unusable.

Name: Diana
Title: These are not size 8 as package says
Review: my 5 year old normally wears 5-6. She is an average 5 year old size..I purchased the size 6 first and they were so small she couldn't pull them up. So I purchased the size 8 and those are even smaller than the size six. Wrong size in the wrong package is my guess, these are MAYBE a size 4..

Name: Anieze Adeyomola
Title: Missing some pants
Review: The pack is 14 and only 12 came. The park opened when I checked.

Name: Christine
Title: ripped iteminside
Review: Item had a pair ripped in the package. did not want to go through the hassle of returns but still disappointed in quality check.

Name: trofotti
Title: Out of 14 pairs (all different sizes), not one that fits. Sizing way(!!) Off
Review: I just got the order. Ordered a size 8 to my slim 10 yo girl. These are way off in a few different ways. Not one pair a true size 8 (on the bottom with the fishes, a true size 8 for comparison).Not only that, but so many different sizes within the pack!!Total disappointment. I ordered them oversees, because I like this brand for shirts and men's undies. Now I have nothing to do with them- hay, maybe they'll fit my pregnancy body.These are just wrong.

Name: shellbee
Title: Runs TINY and shrinks horribly
Review: You get what you pay for- these are like doll underwear. They‚Äôre tiny, they also shrink after that, and uncomfortable for my three year old because they dig in and don‚Äôt really stretch. Had to toss them all.

Name: JillianKK
Title: Waist is elastic
Review: I bought these because the description made me think they had the soft cotton waist band.  They do not.  It's just a cheap scratchy elastic band like every other brand apparently.  My search continues.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: I only recieved 13 pairs and I ordered a 14 pack.
Review: I only got 13 of 14 pairs

Name: Breanna Kirkland
Title: Go a size up
Review: The undies fit a size smaller. Was a waste of money since you cannot return. They shrunk.

Name: M
Title: Chemical Smell
Review: The package looked odd as if it was a knock off. Not at all like the packaging in a store and not like the packaging seen in pictures of other reviews here. However the underwear looked legit. The chemical smell was awful! I washed and soaked the underwear twice and the smell would not go away. I gave up and threw them out. Now the smell is stuck in my washing machine. The smell is sickening.

Name: David
Title: Cute and comfortable BUT just did not last
Review: I initially gave these a 5 star rating. But I had to come back to update with a review. (I just realized that this is my second review on kids underwear...mom life amiright? Lol)So I got these for my now 4-yr-old after she graduated from her potty training pants (which she still wears sometimes until she completely outgrows them). I really liked these...AT FIRST.Pros:They came in a 14 pack! Enough to last her 2 whole weeks! (Although we do kids laundry at least once a week but just in case ya know??) Anyways, the pattern/prints are great, my little one fell in love on the first day. They are very soft and stretchy enough to not cut into her skin. And I really like how thin yet durable the fabric is. (Her potty training pants were too thick and they bunch up under her leggings therefore I had to upgrade her to big girl undies). Most importantly, the price is awesome! I believe I got them for 3 BUCKS while on sale! Thanks Amazon!Con:The elastics on the waist just did not last as long as I hoped. They are no longer holding up onto her hips. I‚Äôm tossing them one by one.The 2 stars are for 1) how cute and comfortable they were 2) what a deal I got on them. Unfortunately, I will not be repurchasing. Even though my little one really liked them, the search for better underwear continues for this momma.

Name: Ro
Title: Package of one size yet they're all different sizes?
Review: I ordered a size 6 for my daughter, yet the underwear are not even consistent with the sizing! Here's a pic of one pair compared to another pair from the same package! WTH!

Name: AO
Title: Color is important
Review: We love these, but both times I tried to order I got a different color than the one I selected.

Name: CAROLINA GARCIA
Title: Calzoncitos froot of the loom
Review: Realmente es peque√±o. Ped√≠ en talla 14 que es la que usualmente Usa mi hija (9 a√±os) y la entrepierna le super aprieta (ella no es gordita!)...as√≠ que no los puede usar. Se quedaron nuevos üòî

Name: Corey Clark
Title: Too small
Review: I ordered these for my petite 5.5 year old (43", 37.5 lbs) and they did not cover her bum.  I did wash and dry them first so maybe they shrunk, but I'm not planning to hang dry underwear, so they really need to fit after they go through the dryer.

Name: CB
Title: Did not get what I ordered‚Ä¶
Review: Bought SPECIFICALLY for the style as most undergarments don‚Äôt fit my daughter very well. Through purchasing several brands and cuts, I have found the fruit of the loom hipsters WITH the fabric covered waistband to be the only ones that work for us. I was excited to find these on Amazon bc they are always sold out in stores. When received, we were disappointed to find that these aren‚Äôt the same style we had been looking for despite the product photo being so.I do not mind color variation at all. Color doesn‚Äôt matter as long as it is the actual product I purchased, but these are a different style all together and do not fit well. I thought I was getting the hipsters with the ‚Äúfabric-covered‚Äù waistband, not the ones with the ‚Äúplush‚Äù waistband. Trust me, there IS a difference of size and fit between the two! Purchase elsewhere if fit matters to you.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Shorted amt
Review: Was shorted 2 pairs of underwear. Says it was a 14 count, but only 12 in the package. Sad.

Name: RT
Title: Didn't get the unicorn underwears
Review: I have always loved Fruit of the Loom. I've bought undershirts for my husband, tank tops for myself and socks and undies for my kids. The quality has always been good and comfortable.This review is based on the fact that my daughter chose these underwears specifically because they contained two unicorn undies, which were not included. I received every single underwear that's in the picture except for the unicorn ones. As you can see in the picture I provided, I even laid the underwear in the same order as the picture and you'll see that the two underwear that are suppose to be unicorn, are not.Please know that my star review isn't based on the quality, it's based on their advertisement of products that don't reflect what you get.

Name: Dunn Girls
Title: Different pattern, same fit.
Review: Fit is fine, fabric is fine, this is my child‚Äôs preferred style and brand of undergarment.  My problem is with the print.  We ordered polka dots and black and white and light pink solids.  What we received were navy blues hearts, rainbow confetti, and dark pinks.  The listing was for assorted patterns, which is what the packaging says bc it‚Äôs assorted colors and patterns in one package.  The listing should say seller picks color or no color choice available.  I‚Äôm keeping them bc we need them, but again I am disappointed in the misrepresentation of their item by showing a more desirable pattern than what is actually available.  My 10yo is very very slender so she has to wear ‚Äúlittle girl‚Äù undies, but she wanted ‚Äúbig girl‚Äù patterns.  I guess that‚Äôs just a hazard of shopping online.

Name: Bee
Title: You get a random package
Review: I should have read reviews first.  But they are underwear and I never saw anything about not getting what you ordered or getting a randomly chosen pack.  We ordered the unicorn/pegasus ones because my daughter loves both.  If it wasnt a hassle to send back and she says they are comfortable, we would send them back.  Had I paid full price they for sure would have went back.  Just be warned you may not get what you think you are ordering.

Name: C
Title: Great quality size UP
Review: I really enjoyed these undoes for my daughter HOWEVER it would be a good idea to have known to size up because the actual sizes are about 2 sizes too small. I'd say it is a DEFECT because we have size 5s that we bought at a store and they are about 1 inch bigger than the size 6s I got off Amazon ..... sad to have washed these before we used then so now I can't return them /:

Name: Amstar
Title: Wrong internet description
Review: I order these for my daughter. It says pack of 14 don‚Äôt let if fool you, we only for 10. So not as much of a good deal as I was originally thinking. They are a little big.

Name: Laurelle
Title: Why do girls undies run so dang small?
Review: So even as a grown woman I have to buy three or more sizes up in underwear to get them to fit properly. Apparently this trend starts young! My daughter is 2 and I had to get her size 6. She is big for her age, but in all her other clothes she is a size 4. I just don't get it... I guess even in toddler underwear they have to make them run stupidly small! I don't have this problem with my son, who is also a big kid mind you. Anyway, just size up I guess. The quality is fine otherwise.

Name: Mother of Pearl 3
Title: It‚Äôs OK for now
Review: I don‚Äôt know what is up with the size charts these days but they don‚Äôt seem to represent the measurements indicated.  I bought these for my 6yo daughter who is tall and solid at 6yo - 4‚Äô4‚Äù and 85lbs.  Her Hanes size 10s we‚Äôre getting small so I bought the Fruit of the Loom size 12 based on the size chart measurements.  They fit like the size 10s Hanes. I should just stick with Hanes. Fruit always ran smaller to me. Will not buy again.

Name: Jasmin
Title: They run very small
Review: My daughter wears a size 6 in pants/shorts. I bought her a size 8 and I had to return them and get a 10 because they run so small!

Name: Mykia
Title: Too tight
Review: I thought my baby would‚Äôve had more room in her underwear I always order a size up, and these were just to small! But fast shipping

Name: MKM13
Title: These underwear run a little smaller than expected
Review: Tia product runs small. My girl just went to a size 8 pants and we Purchased size 10 underwear. They are small.

Name: moti
Title: Soft and comfort but you need to buy one size smaller then usal
Review: Nice t-shirt but the size is not as usal

Name: ChrisB
Title: They are just ok.
Review: What can I say, they are underwear, nothing special about them. They did not arrive nicely packaged; 14 pair of underwear were thrown in a plain plastic bag. A few are not hipsters, but rather bikini underwear. I was planning on adding them to my granddaughter's birthday gifts, but they are not worthy for giving as a gift. I will not purchase them again.

Name: Patti R.
Title: Missing Undies | only received 8 not 10
Review: These are great little undies for kids.  Ironically we only received 8 instead of 10. we would buy again but wish they would send us 2 more :)

Name: Alex
Title: Large, not fit to my size
Review: Thanks

Name: CHRISTINE O.
Title: Unexpected packaging
Review: Received what I ordered, however the packaging was not what I expected. Title: Since this company rejected my last review I added more details for you!
Review: So I ordered these for my for my daughter. Her description is below.‚Ä¢not very comfortable, it feels very scratchy.‚Ä¢not very stretchy, because it feel like there is no stretch.‚Ä¢ I don‚Äôt like the colors because it‚Äôs not the colors we select *the colors we ordered were completely different colors and style of designs as a whole...This is the last time we buy this brand- one you rejected that last review that said the same thing but in the end, we specifically ordered a product based of OUR preferences of color. If I don‚Äôt like the color I have the right to say I don‚Äôt like it! The material wasn‚Äôt that great! The seams were not done evening throughout- it seemed as if the sewing machine was working only half way! It‚Äôs not hard to do a seam..overall in my opinion the product was very cheap! Poorly made and the material used to make was extremely poor!After the first was the seams were breaking which confirms the poorly made product, we pre-wash everything before wearing simply out of caution, I was actually quite surprised as to how the seams were falling apart. I went ahead and order Hanes. We will stick with them now.

Title: Poor inseam sewing - irritates skin
Review: This product is poorly sewn. I bought these for a 7 years old who is in the 35th percentile in height/weight (so small for her age). I bought size 8 after reading that these tend to run small.I washed all of these one time before use on cold. They‚Äôre definitely small for a size 8. My biggest complaint is that the left side of the inseam (where the two pieces of cloth are seen together) is done very poorly. There is a bulge that irritates the skin, since there is basically a lump in the clothing. They can‚Äôt be worn without skin irritation.My daughter is not known to have sensitive skin, but her skin was bright red after wearing these.

Title: horrible seams at the hip - garbage quality undies - go Maidenform is my vote
Review: odd chemical smell permeated when the package was unsealed... that should have been my clue to just process the return.  niece insisted that she liked the print, informed her if the chemical smell persisted the undies were going back; no smell after the wash.  my poor (11 yr old)  niece wore for less than an hour only to result in a chaffed patch due to irregular stitching.  we purchased Maidenform = seams were evenly stitched (smooth) and the seams weren't haggard like these bunch.  half of the package was fine, the other looks like the sewing machine ate the seams.  not worth the money or effort... buy something else.

Review: My daughter is about to turn 8 and I ordered her the Large/12/14 size jacket (which is what I got). The jacket that is supposed to be 2 sizes too big for her barely fits her. I specifically ordered the larger size so that she could wear it for a while but the jacket will probably fit her for a few months at most. Quality-wise it seems ok but nothing to write home about. While my daughter likes the design, I'm trying to convince her to return this.

Name: Karl
Title: My Minnie is Cross Eyed!!
Review: The place that makes these has LOW quality control. The Minnie on my daughters sweater was made poorly, so the face is smooshed and she appears cross eyed. I was really disappointed, but we were about to leave to Disneyland so I just dealt with it. I would buy something else.

Name: Elaine
Title: Disappointed
Review: Jacket is screen printed and would not have ordered if this was known. Also inside hood description is deceptive. Was advertised, I believe, as soft and plush. The inside of the hood is t shirt material and I see nothing soft and plush about that!

Name: L. Johnston
Title: Cute but didn't last long at all
Review: Bought this for my daughter's birthday. After a few washings the zipper came loose at the Hem so I had to see it back together. After about 6 weeks of wear the zipper no longer goes up and down. She's gotten stick in the jacket more than once.  It's cute but made very poorly.

Name: MimiCA
Title: Not good
Review: This product is very cheap and runs really small. The decorations are very plasticky and looked blurred. Had to return.

Name: Dennys N.
Title: Shrinks in cold
Review: Fitted lose on arrival. Shrinks after washed on cold. Go one size up.

Name: Alanna Arnold
Title: Screen print
Review: Minion mouses face was messed up. This was supposed to be my daughter‚Äôs present and I‚Äôm not to thrilled that it looks jacked up.

Name: Lisa Stassforth
Title: Cheap material
Review: It is adorable, but... didn‚Äôt even get to wear it after washing.  Two holes were found in a sleeve. Material seemed thin. Walking machine has no agitator so it wasn‚Äôt ruined that way. Very disappointed.

Name: Suspense and Thriller Lover
Title: Great sweater and good quality... but
Review: This zip up sweatshirt is really super cute.  It's well-made, thick enough, it fits great  and it only took a few short days to get here. However,  unfortunately the manufacturers or sellers fold the sweatshirt in such a way that each side of Minnie's  face is folded onto each other.  Then when you pull it apart the paint  from one side of Minnie's face transfers to the other side of her face leaving marks and blemishes all over her face.  I'm sure I could've returned the item with no problems,  but my daughter really needed a sweater asap  and the damage wasn't so bad that she couldn't wear it.  If I had more time I would have returned it,  but luckily like I said,  even with the damage the product was still in good enough shape that my daughter still wears it  almost every day.  And any four-year-old little girl who loves Minnie Mouse will absolutely love the sweater and won't even notice that one little issue.  It's something that would more bother the parents than anything else.  All in all I would purchase this item again.  But I do hope the sellers read this so that they can change the way they fold the item.  This issue is very easily preventable  if it were just folded in the opposite direction.

Name: Reagan Ross
Title: Cheap product.
Review: Zipper melted when it was washed and dried one time.

Name: Jeremy W
Title: Cute idea but poor quality
Review: Cute idea but very poor quality for a Disney product. Loose and untrimmed threads everywhere, poor stitching, and stuffing coming out of one of the ears. Zipper also seems iffy and isn‚Äôt YKK like most Disney products we‚Äôve bought.Our daughter really likes the hoodie but it doesn‚Äôt seem like it will last very long.Size runs quite small. Our daughter is 3 and the 4T is tight on her.

Name: Claudette T.
Title: Too small
Review: Nice sweatshirt but it definitely is smaller than the size of others. Not true to fit!

Name: Kathy Q
Title: Hood Comes Off
Review: I believe the hood is not a full depth hoodie so that the ears stand up straight on the kiddos' head, but, that means that a slight turn the hood falls back.  I actually hid this sweatshirt because my toddler spends more of her time pulling up the hood than playing outside.  Cute, but that hood is not deep enough.  She has lots of other sweatshirts, this is the only one with that problem.

Name: Goudy Construction
Title: The material is too light weight & the arms are too tight.
Review: The design & color was great. The material used was too thin & the arms were too tight.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Cute!
Review: The jacket was not very soft

Name: QO
Title: cute
Review: Very cute but had an odor which might have been from the "vinyl" feeling Minnie picture.  Turned it inside out and washed it as directed and the odor disappeared.  Had to cut several strings off it as it was not trimmed after being sewn.  It is cute.

Name: Adrian T.
Title: Nice Quality, fits small
Review: Nice lightweight, lined jacket. Cut small.

Name: Gina
Title: Cute but runs a bit small.
Review: This is adorable and my 4 yr old loves it! However, I would size up one size as it is snug and won‚Äôt make it through the summer!

Name: Shaquela
Title: Really cute. Runs small on the sleeves.
Review: Runs a tad bit small on the sleeves. I ordered 4t for my 3 yr old. I‚Äôm going to retuRn it n get the 5t. Cute sweater though.

Name: Edith Masoud
Title: Thin coat
Review: This is a very thin coat. . Not made for a somewhat cool day at all. Disappointed. However, my granddaughter did fall in love with it.

Name: janet
Title: Better than expected

Name: Amazon Customer

I don't think she will get much wear out of this, I'm thinking I should have ordered the XL. Over all this was a great buy, the color was great. I didn't have any problems with the color. I would recommend to all.

Title: Minni Jacket

Name: Remona Nelson

Name: carol hulse

Title: Great quality and perfect for toddler
Review: Soft and warm, yet lightweight. Easy to layer on top of clothing. Hood & ears with bow are amazing! Toddler is 37‚Äù and 40lbs. Had to get 4T because 3T was too tight, wouldn‚Äôt have fit over top of r shirts or long sleeves well, at all. 4T is great size and will definitely last throughout winter season.

Name: Amazon Customer
Title: Sweatshirt
Review: Was a replacement for our granddaughter who is an avid Minnie Mouse fan.  She grew out of her last one.

Name: Transplanted Walla Walla Sweet Onion
Title: Size is not accurate but the color is very nice
Review: The sweatshirt was advertised as a 4/5 according to the size chart offered with the ad.  It is labelled a 2-4.  My niece is tall for her age.  She needs a size 4 that is proportionately long enough to fit her slim and tall build.  According to the toddler range of sweatshirt patterns in my collection that I have sewn in the past, the sweatshirt is a Toddler 4 in chest circumference but is a short size 2 in body length.  The sleeves look disproportionately long for the body length.  Other than being poorly sized, the shirt is nicely made but heavier fabric would be nice for cold winter months ahead.  I would make her a sweatshirt but quality fabrics with coordinating ribbing are difficult to find locally or too expensive to purchase online.

Name: Stacey
Title: Not happy!
Review: The sweatshirt I ordered for my child was just delivered.  It is too small even after ordering a size bigger and it also has a large black spot on the front that was there when I removed it from the bag.  I am NOT happy!!!

Name: Andrea Hernandez
Title: This is NOT for a teenager
Review: This was supposed to be for 14-16 year olds. I ordered it for my 11 year old who is tiny, she is barely 80 lbs, but likes to wear baggy clothes. This was so small that my 5 year old is the one currently wearing it. And I checked the tag, it's definitely labeled as 14-16.

Name: Fabiola
Title: The sizes are too small!!!
Review: I ordered these for my volleyball team and ordered the exact sizes I was asked. When they came and I opened the extra Large it said it was a YXL. The product itself did not say that in the description. Now I have wasted valuable time and money. DO NOT BUY!

Review: Wanted to just do a refund but it wants me to return the product which means I have to waste my time to do that when I already wasted my time ordering it and still get what I needed.

Review: This sweater is beautiful but they sent a youth large like they know I‚Äôm not that small and now I can‚Äôt wear the sweater o want my money back.

Title: Weird fit

So I kept it for her younger sister who usually wears a toddler size 4. I ended up going with the next size up for her.It‚Äôs definitely soft and light weight and everything we were looking for, but the sizing was WAY off.

Title: Disappointed

Title: Runs VERY, very small!
Review: These are great, affordable sweatshirts that will layer wonderfully under our son‚Äôs school spirit shirt of the same color on chilly days! BUT, He wears a 5T, I originally ordered the XS, which is more like a 2T, then I ordered the S, which is more like a 4T. So now we‚Äôre waiting on the M to arrive. Good thing they‚Äôre only $4!

Name: MC
Title: Nice sweatshirt, but‚Ä¶

I was going to make a custom sweatshirt for my daughter so I‚Äôll for sure wash it.  For other customers just incase check the inside of your items and wash them before using them.

Review: Last year I purchased three Hanes sweatshirts to make ugly Christmas sweaters for my children whose ages, today, are 7, 6, and 5. Fast forward to this year and I purchase another three sweaters. Immediately, I noticed the difference. The sweaters are still nice and I recommend but, please size up. I have included pictures to help. The first picture is of the sweater I bought this year in size small. Second picture is of the sweater I bought last year also in size small. The last two pictures are of the NEW sweater on top of last year‚Äôs sweater and then an up close of the tags. Again, recommend but size up.

The media could not be loaded.

Title: HOW DID THESE BECOME AMAZON CHOICE??? 4 SIZES TOO SMALL!
Review: THESE ARE ABSOLUTELY NOT BIG GIRL SIZES, BY ANY STRETCH OF THE IMAGINATION! I ordered 1 black & 1 white, both in size XL.  They looked more like an XS! BIG FAIL!  I should have known for the price of $5 each, something would be wrong, I more expected something minor, like annoying tag or hem coming out. But these are terribly under-sized. I don‚Äôt appreciate the hassle of returns, especially during CORONA when getting out id very limited. for seller being too lazy to correct the issue, by informing buyers in bold lettering next to pricing, that they are extremely under-sized, so I could have made adjustments in sizing or ordered another color that was twice the price, but would fit properly, or so I could just skip it. Such a hassle & I will be sure to keep this company‚Äôs name  in my file, so I trust non of their products for future orders.

Name: Kindle Customer
Title: POOR QUALITY from a trusted brand
Review: Had I not needed this shirt the day it arrived it would‚Äôve been sent back. On top of it not being very comfortable it arrived with a hole in the armpit‚Ä¶the stitching had come completely unraveled! VERY POOR QUALITY! I never write reviews but this just really frustrated me!

Name: winteroses
Title: Not true to size
Review: I ordered this in large, which is my usual size. This may be a child's large, but it didn't say youth. It's definitely not an adult large, so these are on the small side of the printed size. I think large was like a small/medium

Name: Larissa
Title: Way too small and poor quality
Review: This shirt was a complete disappointment. Based on other reviews that the shirt runs small, I ordered the next size up. My child is an average-sized 7 year old (wears size 6/7 shirts), and the Medium size of this shirt was WAY too small even before it was washed and dried. The shirt had no stretch or give to it at all, and the material is very thin. I would only recommend the white one as an undershirt since you can see through it. I would be returning this, except my 4 year old can wear it as an undershirt. Otherwise, it would have been a total waste of money.

Name: Patti Pitcock
Title: not the quality I expected
Review: This shirt was not the quality I expected Hanes to be so I cancelled the next order of a pink shirt...she will get very little wear in this....cheaply made..I should have known but thought I was just getting a good buy

Name: Royng1204
Title: They are small than what I expected
Review: The material is good but they are too small, I was going to exchange or reorder them, but the price went up more than double.

Name: Rebecca
Title: size chart and order do NOT match
Review: I ordered a large...checking the size chart, it said large was 38-40 bust size...um...then I received a Large 10-12 for girls...really? I needed this so I could iron on vinyl for a Christmas gift!!!! This stupidity ruined everything...I don't have time to get different a different shirt before our Christmas gift exchange! read your orders and read your own size charts...US women's size large 38-40 bust size should not mean girls large 10-12! so pissed!!!!! ...and to top it off I ordered two colors so I got screwed twice!!!!!

Name: Sandra Johnson
Title: Hanes Girls' ComfortSoft Long Sleeve Tee size L & XL

Title: Comfort and quality

Name: saleh fuad
Title: Quality
Review: Very thin quality is average

Name: Januckey
Title: Arrived with a Hole in One Shirt
Review: These shirts are exactly as described and soft, however, one of mine arrived with a hole where the arm seams are. Very disappointed. Besides it taking forever to get here, they were damaged when they arrived.

Name: Coki Ruiz
Title: Too small, description not accurate
Review: This t-shirts are for little girls, the description of the product is not accurate! I‚Äôm petite 5.2 so I ordered the L size and still is too small, I normally buy teenagers clothes and the fit well! So basically the sizing would be XL= Small for a petite adult!

Name: Jeri cullinan
Title: was this a childrens XL?
Review: this shirt popped up when i entered plus size in the search bar, so naturally, when it was labeled "BIG Girls" i assumed , you know what is said about "assumed" so i ordered XL to insure it would be large enough.  i couldnt get my arms into this shirt. either it is a girls shirt or it runs exceptionally small. i sent it back
